I use it mostly for controlling lights, but do listen to music at times as well. It is very good about providing information for the questions I ask. I will probably use it more as I get more used to what it can do. The sound quality isn't too bad for a small speaker, it definitely isn't hi-fi, but I didn't expect it to be. Pretty good product.

Love this echo plus, connects to smart home devices with the built-in hub and also includes a temperature sensor. Very responsive and works well with my other echo devices. Sound is good and set up is very easy. It arrived in two days with Prime and I recommend this item and seller to others.

Sound is amazing, but the functionality isn’t there. Im not 100% sure what this can all do because when I ask it normally responds as I’m not sure, or I couldn’t locate such and such, I would honestly say DONT waste your money. The required mobile app is TERRIBLE! Full of bugs, and the least user friendly app I've ever used.

We use it mostly for music. It has a wonderful sound, quite impressive for a small little box. It’s very easy to communicate with Alexa. We also purchased some smart lights and are using it for that as well. It exceeds our expectations!

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice replacement for my Echo (2nd Generation
reviews.reviewText: I would have bought this when I purchased my Echo (2nd Generation). The sound has a richness that was missing from my Echo. Better mid-range and bass. If you're looking to purchase a new Echo consider the Echo Plus. I highly recommend.

I have a handful of echo devices including both Show sizes, Dots, & Spots. I bought a set of these and set them up as a stereo pair (no sub). The sound is the best out of any device I have. The units are smaller than they look. I would recommend these.

reviews.reviewTitle: Small size but surprisingly big sound
reviews.reviewText: Nice unit. I purchased this Echo Plus (2nd gen) to play music and it sounds great. The unit is smaller than I was expecting, but the sound (for music) is surprisingly excellent. Strong bass, nice mids, crisp highs. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice little update to my home.
reviews.reviewText: Okay, first of all I like this Echo a lot. Nothing to complain about. Setup was easy and works just as expected. What I would complain about is purchasing the item and then I went on sale for $40 less only 8 days later. Amazon informed me that they don’t do price adjustments on previous purchases. Not a good policy.

reviews.reviewTitle: I got what I asked for & some
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to upgrade to EchoPlus because that’s what True Echo lovers do! However, I didn’t imagine the sound quality would be so Fab - So impressive! For now I’ll only use it for my Audible Books, Flash Briefings & occasional music! If you’re looking for an exceptional speaker, you’ll be impressed w/EchoPlus. Thanks Amazon!

Very great product, the sound quality is night and day difference compare to old echo dots. The built in hub for Philip hue is convenient but beware that it is not an actual hub as it won’t work with other services (such as Apple home kit) besides Amazon Echo. That being said, I would recommend this product to anyone who wants to upgrade their expenses with Amazon echo

reviews.reviewTitle: Not portable, needs to be plugged in to operate.
reviews.reviewText: Well apparently I didn't read all of the specs since I didn't know Alexa is not portable, meaning I can't unplug her and take her outside! Other than that it's a fine device though she doesn't seem to be able to do simple math. That or I'm not asking her correctly.

Am not very demanding of her, but Alexa has answered all my music requeats.
I need to put the time in for more information on bluetooth, linking, commands, etc., but look forward to gettjng more out of it.
Sound quality ius very good, but didn't need just another bluetooth speaker...

I use this to stream music from Pandora. The sound is very good and 99% of the time Alexa understands commands. I also use Alexa as my alarm clock, weather report and various other things. I love Alexa. Life is much easier with Alexa!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent product but needs Roku app.
reviews.reviewText: Both the Eco Dot and Eco Plus 2nd generation Alexa units are obviously very well built and crafted. It takes a little while to get everything to sync. I also purchased 4 Meross smart plugs. They work very well with both the Eco Dot and the Eco Plus. I plan on ordering 4 more. One drawback and I hope Amazon will fix this. It doesn't communicate with my Roku.

I never thought I would get one of these, but decided to give it a try, due to it going on sale, during prime days. I am glad I made that decision. It understands me like magic and can be anything from a spell checker to translator. I am going to hook up the room lights to it next. Great Gizmo.

Setup was easy and the sound quality is great. I bought this product for the built-in Zigbee control function and it works every time. I have a large space and was a bit skeptical about being able to control lights on the outside of my garage. I placed the Echo on the first floor and then on the second floor and still works. love the control!. I do not use the voice as much. All control is done using the Alexa app.

Helpful for quick news/weather updates and for controlling household electrical appliances. The sound is good when listening to music and it's great that it allows you to turn off the mic so that "big brother" isn't listening all the time.

I purchased a Dot and bought this within a few days. Great product. I like the sound and Alexa integration. Be careful, now I’m spending a mint buying smart accessories. Lol. Seriously great sound for something so small. I’m happy I purchased it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lots of fun and very entertaining.
reviews.reviewText:
Had a little issue with programming with my Samsung 8S+ the use of my airpad other than that works as advertise.
Play music and ck wx and ask it to tell joke and ask it questions. Soon to program it to operate lights security features.

reviews.reviewTitle: not much better than the Echo
reviews.reviewText: for what it cost me, and looking back knowing what I know now after hear the difference I wish I would have just bought 2 more Echo's. For what I use them for. Don't get me wrong it sounds good as a stand a lone speaker, but not at all what they advertise. 2 Echo's for the price of 1 Echo Plus! Just keep that in mind, when you are looking too buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Crystal Clear sound and works with pretty slow internet speed!
reviews.reviewText: this is stylish and is working great. So far, I have only used Alexa for music and weather. I have a ton of emails on everything she can do but haven't had time to get to them. The sound is very clear and we only have an "up to 12mb" speed internet and have had no issues using it at all!

I was quite surprised at the difference in sound quality compared to the regular 2nd gen and the 2nd gen plus. There is definitely a more richer sound compared to the regular 2nd gen. It seems that from each version of echo in this category has gotten better and better.
Improved sound. Internal thermometer. Easy set up. Easy pairing with Echo Sub.

I am surprised the Alexa app will not work on my Chromebook. I wished I could use my Echo plus in conjunction with my Sonos speakers, to add stereo to more rooms in my house. I would buy more Echo plus' if that were the case. For security reasons I wished I could name my system Hildegard instead of Alexa.

I received Alexa as a Christmas gift and it was he best GIFT eve!! she does everything I ask her for. It was purchased for me but my entire family uses Alexa. I can't wait to buy one for my desk at work and a few as gifts through out the year. Thank you Amazon for Alexa!!

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s all about the audio quality
reviews.reviewText: Audio quality is far and above the Echo Dot, and noticeably better than the standard Echo. Line-in functionality makes this a great replacement for your computer speakers. I can feel the bass rumble my desk when I’m playing video games.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product. Please add Spanish capabilities soon!!
reviews.reviewText:
I am enjoying Alexa, The sound quality of the echo plus is really good, when I first bought it I wasn’t expecting that. I always set alarms and reminders and it works great. I like to wake up with nice music.

There is something that I would add to Alexa and it is Spanish lenguaje capabilities, I hope it will come soon!

So far the Echo Plus is a 5-stars product for me!

This is my third Echo device. The sound is really great for such a small speaker. Also the mics seem to be much better than the 1st gen. The bass on it is great as well. Now remember its a small device so don't try comparing it to a mutlispeaker home theater. But having it on my coffee table it fills my large living room with good sound. I highly reccomend this

I LOVE this! I don’t know how I got by without one for so long. Jeopardy is fun and I can ask it random questions. It even plays specific genres of music. The design is sleek and looks nice in any room. The sound quality is crazy good too

Never been happier . I bought the Echo 2generation and I liked it so much I decided I cant live with out the Echo Plus 2nd generation . WOW I grouped them got 1 in my living room and 1 in the master bedroom. Now all I have to say is Alexa play my music everywhere and it plays in both the rooms. Needless to say I must have 1 now for kitchen and 1 for my deck. OMG I'm so hooked lol. What a great product Amazon!!!!!! You really out did yourself

reviews.reviewTitle: I would not recommend this unit if you're expecting "premium" sound, as advertised
reviews.reviewText:
I was certainly expecting far more "premium sound" for the extra money. The sound is really no better, and certainly not as loud, as the regular Echo.
I really didn't need this Echo, but wanted to experience better sound quality to enhance my overall experience.
For the added price, this fell short.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't let perfect be the enemy of good
reviews.reviewText: Love the sound quality and ease of Alexa integration with smart home devices. Only issue is that Alexa has difficulty answering many questions that the "competition" answers easily, and Alexa often does not understand simple commands like turn on x. Despite these issues, I really like this device.

Works well but has issues. Often find I have to repeat myself slowly and with exaggerated enunciation to get Alexa to operate the correct item. The sound on Alexa isn’t as clean and crisp as I’d like it to be. Sounds a bit muffled and sometimes can’t understand what Alexa is saying. And, no, this isn’t a hearing problem on my end *grin*. Some guests have noticed that also.

Alexa I love you. I have 3 now and it is to the only women who will talk with me and answer my questions without an issue. Order yours today. The music sound is GREAT and I am glad I have her playing my songs all over the house. My wife and I love her. Order yours today.

I really love it. I primarily use this for music and basic questions. The sound is great! Very impressive for the pricepoint. The thing that made me give it 4 out of 5 stars is because it seems to be dropping the connection with the internet eventhough I have it close by.

The old ones were so bad at hearing me they would confuse chair with tree.
This one is so much better it can pick up a command as I am walking up the stairs.
The new version has dramatically reduced the swearing and cursing at/of Alexa.
Just useful enough to keep her around.

I can't offer much of a review because this item - All New Echo Plus - was purchased as a gift for someone who asked specifically for it and provided the link. I feel certain the recipient did due diligence in their research and this is probably a good product but I have no personal experience.

reviews.reviewTitle: ALEXA OUR NEW HOST AND ENTERTAINER
reviews.reviewText:
Alexa is our friend. I bought it for my wife Beauty Salon to play the background music.

Well Alexa is the Artist of the Salon, because any of our patrons can ask her to play the music, they like to hear, while they are taken care their hair. Everybody, welcomes Alexa and some have telling us that they bought theirs.

My 2nd gen failed so I called support. They verified my identity and then attempted remote access for diagnostics. I assume they saw a problem because a moment later he said.....we have a replacement unit on the way. I checked my order status and it was already listed.
ok. Excellent service so far but there's more. I opened my Alexa app and had an extra unit I didn't remember naming,.
Turns out Amazon added the device to my network.
All I had to do was power it up and it was ready to go.

Customer service above and beyond expectations.

Thank you Amazon

It will take some time to learn to utilize all of the skills available with this device. But I find the technology amazing and enjoy the convenience of using this device in a number of ways. From Smart hub operating lights etc., to my favorite music upon request. This thing is great.....
It’s really not that much of an improvement, sonically, over the previous echo plus. I’m glad I didn’t buy more to replace my others.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not rechargeable!! Always connected to power!
reviews.reviewText: I extremely disliked that it has to be constantly connected to a power source. I thought it would have a rechargeable battery, but it doesn’t. Not mobile like I thought it would have been. So you can’t take it anywhere you want.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quite an improvement over the original
reviews.reviewText: I'm an Alexa fan and had owned one of the originals (along with second gen Dot) for a few years. This was an upgrade to my original Echo and it is an upgrade in every way. Better sound, better appearance, better size. BTW, I upgraded the Dot, too. Love the new Dot as well.

I'm still learning what Alexa can do, but so far, very happy with setup. Will have to learn more about developing "skills" and training Alexa but we were able to play holiday music right out of the package. Impressive speaker quality for such a small unit. Nice design and color so the unit fits in almost anywhere.

I was able to use an external speaker for the Dot, but when it came to telephone calls there was an echo... ironically. I do not have the problem with my Echo Plus. It gives decent sound quality for music as well. Worth the extra twenty bucks for the upgrade!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good speaker for filling a room, or in my case small apartment
reviews.reviewText: Very sensitive microphone it hears allot of things as it's command word. The shifts quality is actually pretty good though. I was using an echo dot and a bose sound bar by it was too directional. This fills up my apartment perfectly with enough base and it gets enough distance with bluetooth. Now if you prefer line in line i do this also has support for that which is amazing and was an unexpected joy to realize.

My Echo was a Christmas gift. I was about ready to spend hundreds of dollars on a new sound system mostly just for radio listening. There is no need to do that now. Very happy with the quality of the sound. Love the voice activation, too. Also purchased two "dots" and put them in my upstairs bedroom and office. Easy to install and work great.

I recently Purchased 3 Alexa echoes. I bought two of the new echoes and 3 of the new dots. I have them in almost all the rooms, the new Echos sound better at higher volumes than the older ones. The voice recognition has improved, but think it could use a little more work as sometimes Alexa hangs and you have to repeat what you just said. I now have 2 new Echos, 2 new dots, a Tap, and EcoBee4 thermostats with built in Alexa, helping to control, lights, power outlets and more. Still waiting on my invite for the Auto Echo Nd I will then have Alexa everywhere.

I HAD THE ECHO DOT WHICH WAS GREAT BUT HAD TO BUY AND EXTRA SPEAKER. THIS ECHO PLUS IS FANTASTIC. SOUNDS LIKE YOU HAVE A LARGE SPEAKER HOOKED UP TO HER AND THE SOUND MAGNIFYS AND SOUNDS FANTASTIC. LOVE IT!

After a challenging time integrating Alexa with different devices, it’s been fairly easy to use. The sound has too much base and though I’ve adjusted the treble and bass levels. Otherwise I’m enjoying this product and very glad I made the purchase.

Still happy with my Echo Plus, so purchased another one for my daughter. Actively use it for relax with music, to get needed info. The only disappointing moment I experienced recently is that it doesn't recognize my switches properly and doesn't work with Mi Home skill, I can't use it for Smart Home unfortunately. It was a big hope...

I think it is wonderful. I was not familiar with Alexa and I am very impressed. I can't believe the sound quality and I just think it is amazing how it answers all your requests, especially the music. Kind of sorry I spent $200 for a Bose speaker to listen to music, this is just as good if not better and it was only $100. My husband and I think it is amazing and we use it when we travel in our RV.

The Echo Plus are much better sounding than the other Echo speakers. They are still small speakers, and do not have the capability to sound like stand alone tower speakers. Once you realize this, you can enjoy the sound.

I have fallen in love with Alexa. She knows a lot...not everything...but a lot. The music is fun when I have a hankering to hear some delta blues or perhaps Vivaldi. The Echo Plus, in my estimation, is well worth the cost.

It is pretty cool. Hate having to say Alexa all the time but understand....I guess...."turn on Left Lamp" should be enough...
When everything is off and I say "Alexa, turn on Frasier on Netflix"....It should be able to determine that the TV needs turned on and then proceed from there. Or when I say "Alexa" call my wife a butthead..." I think she should do it and not reply with...."hmmm, I don't know that one".... But, hey, I'm just a cook.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa needs hearing aids...but her output sound rocks.
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes Alexa just gets it all wrong. Sometimes she wont pick up your voice over music coming out. Then you just end up yelling at her. Otherwise this is great. The sound is actually quite phenomenal for tge speaker size.

It is small and compact with great sound. Perfect for a bedroom. And add in Amazon Music I use it every night for thunderstorm sounds while I sleep. This is my 2nd Echo, first one is a 1st gen and this has great quality feel to it. My only wish is that I could be able to turn the top like the 1st gen to raise or lower the volume easier. Couldn't be happier!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very loud, just needs a few improvements
reviews.reviewText:
I mean.. it does what you want it to do, nothing too complex here, just set it up, talk to it, and that's it.
Although it could use more features, and improvements, eg; Alexa isn't very specific on the chances of rain, and doesn't answer certain questions correctly, but overall does a lot of things and makes life more convenient.

Amazing Sound, very easy to use, Alexa works just great But only if you US resident.
This was my biggest disappointing from Amazon and this product. You cannot starts working with him until you download the app that works only in USA

Looks like and sounds like exactly what I wanted. An Echo primarily for sound quality to use outside on a covered lanai at my home.
“Alexa, connect to my iPhone” Then playing any music on my playlist that I like. Great product, very happy with it!!!

The Echo Plus is so fun! We really enjoy all that Alexis knows! She can answer almost everything we ask!! We love being able to just name a song/band and in seconds we are listening to it! She gives me the weather and news every morning on my way out the door!! She is just a nice item to have around!!!

The only thing i hate is about Alexa Listen to our conversation at home and Alexa don't know a lot of information when we need to ask "Alexa says i don't know about that", Alexa needs to update the dictionary and need to improve in Encyclopedia,
Alexa needs to stop listening conversation.

It works, works well. Hub built in. The speaker is okay. But add the Echo subwoofer and it sounds amazing.edit. After about six months of use I can say this. Alexa has lots of problems. Half the time doesn’t respond, or does whatever it wants to do. I regret the whole Alexa ecosystem.

Love the sound quality and ease of (on/off) control of electrical devices. Will definitely purchase a second Echo Plus (2nd Gen) for stereo sound enjoyment. Only wish Amazon would have integrated USB for charging instead of the proprietary plug.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound & works with our smart accessories!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for Christmas to use in our kitchen and absolutely love it, we are still learning all of its features and skills some of which are very informative and entertaining! The sound & bass it puts out are amazing!

Alexa ECHO Plus is the best thing since sliced bread and answerers most every question you ask her no matter what it is even Isidor temp I don't know how no wires and outdoor temp all this is instant, plays songs by title ot artist I am just so happy with Alexa I still cna't believe it best #120.00 on sale I ever spent on anything.

Owned the regular echo (still do) and LOVE IT! Love the usability. However, ever since getting the new 2nd gen Echo Plus (which I upgraded to because we love and use our Echo so much.) The listening skills have decreased. We now have to look and speak directly at our Echo Plus. I tried moving it around, but to no avail. I keep hoping that Amazon comes out with a fix for it, or maybe I just have a defective product. Not sure what to do with it, it works okay, just not like it used to.

I had a first generation Echo and this version is so much better! The base is richer sounding and it's easier to run Alexa now that she has her own hub. Plus I love the smaller but wider design. And it now matches my décor! Great improvement to an already perfect little machine!

I dont even have to scream at it so she can hear me from a far distance. She was extremely easy to set up and the speaker on it exceeded my expectations. For anyone wanting to start a smart home or even just have a smart speaker I suggest this. The bass is good and the volume on it is really good. Give alexa a try.. you wont regret it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Should have bought this one first!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the echo dot first and had to add a speaker for music. Then bought the echo but was not real pleased with the sound so I am very pleased with the echo plus for listening to music. An extra plus is my wife is happy with it too.

Okay so this review is probably completely skewed since I’m comparing to the echo dot I just switched out with but this speaker is AMAZING!!!! Hands down night and day compared to a dot. If you’re considering upgrading just stop, and buy it!

So far I love it. It looks great, it sounds great, and with the built-in hub it works great with other devices. I have connected Hue bulbs to it and they work very well (though I don't get the same functionality that using the Hue Bridge brings).

This is definitely a step up from the previous version. The sound is much better. Of course this isn’t a Bose speaker so don’t expect the sound to match. I love this upgrade! I have it in my kitchen and Alexa can hear me even when I’m 2 rooms away in the Living room.
Have really enjoyed! Great music selection and sound. Unbelievable information! Have not yet paired with lights or thermostat.

Amazing! The sound is so profound and crisp even on low volume. Honestly wasn’t expecting it to be this great. If you’re like myself and love nice bass, than look no further, this is the device is for you. I haven’t heard any breaks or cracks in the quality. Before this device, I was using the smaller echo gen 3 unit, and the sound was ok, its just the bass wasn’t giving me satisfaction. It lacked performance. But this here, WOW. It’s well worth the extra money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy life with my Echo! It saves me time and always has the answer I need!
reviews.reviewText: My home is smarter and more efficient! I do the flash briefing and love the ability to make a shopping list directly to Amazon Fresh! I used to use post-it’s to remind me of things but now I just ask Alexa!

We’re having a lot of fun with Alexia. The sound quality is surprisingly good, and the amount of music available via Amazon is amazing. Alexis is also a wealth of information, and she provides a number of helpful services. Her setup is easy and uncomplicated.

This Echo Plus has deep bass and high quality sound. I am really impressed by this improvement since the previous Echo. I still own 2 other Echos and almost 8 Echo Dots around the house. I am really happy with Amazon Echo so far.

We dislike that Echo Plus will not play with a battery connected to it. It having to be plugged into an electric outlet limits it's use for us. We do not know if the batteries we purchased from you were defective or if the connection on the Echo was faulty. It is a problem we wish Amazon would research why the two only work a short time then quit altogether.

Bought a stereo pair to replace a Single Sonos Play:1 in the master bedroom. Sound great enjoying the stereo separation with solid bass and mid tones. Pair has occasionally lost sync requiring me to power cycle them both.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo is very useful for so many things
reviews.reviewText: I like the convenience of it. I haven't gotten into ordering with it yet. I love that I can ask for the type of music I'm in the mood for and that it will play NPR for me. I wish it interfaced with ROKU as I am unsure about buying the Amazon TV fire stick. I am very satisfied with ROKU. That's the only downside for me.

We got this because we listen to music quite a bit and wanted a solid speaker with Alexa. This thing accomplishes just that. It can play loud and has solid bass. I was happy with what we paid for it and the quality.

Works great. I listen to it every day. Have no yet tried to automate the house yet. It is very convenient to simply name a song or composer and it immediately starts to play. Also alarm function, weather, and time, plus more that I do not yet use.
I have not used the hub yet but the sound quality of the Echo+ is MUCH better the DOT2 and the Echo also. So I'm happy with my purchase:) Oh! you can control the bass frequency by voice to, SWEET!

reviews.reviewTitle: Bought two and paired them as stereo. Great sound quality.
reviews.reviewText: The Echo does very well at speech recognition. I purchased two of these for my wife as a cheaper alternative to a Bose stereo. She loves the voice interaction and the paired stereo sound quality is very good. The only negative we have to say about the Echo is the delay in volume level changes. Which is why we gave the sound quality a 4 instead of a 5. When we say "Alexa volume level 5" or "Alexa volume 5" the sound stays lowered for 5 to 10 seconds before the sound plays at the requested volume level. Otherwise, a great tool for the home.

reviews.reviewTitle: If you like music this is the best thing.
reviews.reviewText: My wife listened to music all the time but I did not listen too often. Now the I have the echo I listen to music all the time. It is great. I get to listen to a lot of the songs from when I was younger. It is also great for information purposes. A question comes up and all you have to do is ask Alexa. I am very glad we got the echo with Alexa.

My kids suggested I get this, LOVE it. Use it for lists, just great, but it controls lights in hard to reach places like over the mantle and I use one of the plugs for my Diesel truck to turn on the engine heater. Bought the DOT for the bedroom, look out world.

Love the device just have one issue. I cannot get Alexa Guard to work. Called support and they were no help. Said they would escalate the issue to technical support and call me back yet they never did. Device and app are up to date. If I can get this feature to work I would give it 5 starts.
The sound is pretty good out of this speaker. Love that it has the built in hub and it also came with a free philips hue bulb for $100. What a deal. Love adding new things to make my home smarter

I love Alexa and how it is incorporated into our entire smart set up. Its is sometimes frustrating as Alexa doesn’t always hear you, understand you, and doesn’t always complete what you ask even though it says “okay.”

after having the older echo plus, pair of sonos ones, and just sent back the echo show waiting for the next version, this echo plus is great for a small room all by itself and is a warmer version of the bright earlier version, like a warm hug in the master bedroom, its perfect

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! I love how I can control my lights with the sound of my voice. I love the sound quality of the music, I love how she can guard my home and notify me when she hears glass break or the smoke alarm go off!! Even bought an second one for my parents and they love theirs too

reviews.reviewTitle: Definitely get two, for stereo PowerSound
reviews.reviewText: The new Amazon Echo Plus (2nd Gen) - Premium sound speakers are wicked awesome, more than (LOUD) enough for my apartment life. Definitely buy in a pair, well worth it, excellent stereo sound. And I gotta say it, as if I were a teenager again, Crank it, the sound kicks ass!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best smart speaker in the market
reviews.reviewText: Starting this thing feel so premium and sound quality is premium toooo I got smart plug everywhere in my house it’s really easy use I always start my morning listening podcast or music on it sound quality is really good tooo first I was gonnna buy Apple HomePod but my girlfriend recommended me to try this and I was really impressed by Alexa.

reviews.reviewTitle: I have a new roommate named Alexis!
reviews.reviewText: I love my new roommate. Her name is Alexia. She turns my lights off and on, plays music for me, wakes me up, gives me timers, even talks to me, tells me facts and jokes. And, that is just a few of the things she does. She never talks back or borrowes my makeup.

I bought this Echo Plus for personal use. I love using EP for making phone calls and listening to all kinds of music. It took time to set the EP up, but it was worth the effort. Thanks for making my life more fun. Mr. Paul O. Elsten

This thing is awesome. I already had 2 echo dots and they are great. But the bass and sound quality from the Echo Pmus is just awesome. You will not regret your purchase. Mine came with a free Philips smart bulb.

We contemplated getting a sonos (alexa enabled) speaker, but decided to try the Echo Plus (2nd Gen) after seeing it in an Amazon Bookstore. Glad we did - the sound is great, and price was right (was on sale)

Sound quality is great!
Using mine in a smaller space so I did not feel the need for the additional base model.
Bonus: Knows why a raven is like a writing desk!
Setup was fairly simple and the directions were adequate for me.
Waking up to morning weather, traffic and news has been great :)
Overall I'd recommend this device for any household.

Working from home and rarely going out due to medical woes, I am so thankful for Amazon itself and the Echo Plus. I have the Hue lighting feature so I don't have to walk into a dark room. If I fall asleep with the light on, I can turn it off without getting up. I can dim or brighten the lights again without having to get up. I'm still exploring other features. I encourage anyone who wants automation to take a look at the Echo. I love listening to audio books instead of watching TV to fall asleep. Two thumbs up!

What is not to like? My friend and I both bought one and I cannot imagine life without Alexa! The sound is EXCELLENT! Why isn’t everything Alexa enabled? I find myself telling Alexa to
find more things than my phone. Seriously. How did I live without her???

reviews.reviewTitle: You can stream from many platforms.
reviews.reviewText: I mostly use it to listen to streamed music. I had a HomePod which allows streaming only through Apple. Sound quality is not as good as the HomePod, but it is pretty good. I am really pleased with the second generation Alexa.

First of all, it came with a wrong plug.
After finding a plug for it I was able to make it work.
Second, it's not such a big difference if you are looking to upgrade only for a better quality sound system. Yes I know, it's loud but still needs work to get a clear and high quality sound. Maybe 5th generation!
I haven't had a chance to check other features yet!
Good customer service though, I'm on the phone right now and trying to fix the issue and so far they have been very nice and helpful.

Excellent voice recognition but the sound quality is not that great.
Compared to a Sonos One the sound is a little raspy and the bass is almost non-existant.
I really like the unit I just wish it had a better sound quality for the price.

The echo plus was so easy to set up. My son had bought me the 1st echo and I sent it back I couldn’t figure out how to use it properly. We love being able to tell Alexa what type of music we want to hear and it goes right to it, no more scanning stations for what we want to hear.

I love this so far! I was annoyed that the bulb offered needed a $120 set to work and didn't understand why they'd send it (the info for it says you need the hub). I tried to have the app "discover" it anyway. Turns out that it works fine on its own

The Amazon Echo is a technological wonder. Sound quality is amazing, especially for a devise this size. Downside is the poor instructions and startup information. Wife was on the phone with Amazon for over an hour !! Of course, she has a lot to blame for that. I stayed out of it!

I upgraded from dot for better sound quality. I had a little trouble getting connection to internet as it took 3 tries but nothing serious. Sound is much superior to the dot. It seems to take voice commands better also

reviews.reviewTitle: Hook up instructions not easy to follow
reviews.reviewText: First, let me say that I love this product. The sound is outstanding. However, I have a Mac computer and it was very difficult for me to get it to work. The instructions need to be clearer.

I like the usual features of the echo device except the sound was not as profound as I thought it would be. I was expecting a much deeper sound on the bass but was disappointed in that. overall it's okay.
Recently ordered this as an option for music during our father’s 85yr celebration. Siblings (& spouses) in from MT, AZ, OH, and MD. Was a lot of fun, and throughly enjoying. Highly recommend.

What can I say it sounds real good and has quality bass for the size. I can not wait to purchase the Alexa Sub Speaker they have. to pair it to. Also an easy purchase with easy pay of 5 months split under $30.00 can not beat that.

Beautiful nice design I had the Echo Dot last time. This one is phenomenal speaker all the way around. Extremely easy set up after you download the Alexa app. It did take a while to get even though I am a prime member.

After seeing how the Dots worked at a friends house I was compelled to buy this Alexa Plus. Plus you can buy it at a monthly payment if you want. It's a real big help in a variety of tasks plus fun to use!

reviews.reviewTitle: Using in our vacation home as well as regular house
reviews.reviewText: We are using it in our vacation home which is 3 hours away. It's doing fine with the integration although it doesn't know it's three hours away and gives the weather for the regular home!

Love this! We originally bought the echos for our bedrooms later added this in the kitchen. We haven’t utilized all of its features yet. But I love how I can make announcements to our kids upstairs instead of yelling! The kids love setting their own alarms asking about weather and other things. The best feature for me is I can play a playlist through every device in the entire house!

A really great speaker and allot more for what many would pay allot more for anywhere else. Sound and trajectory is full and symphonic. Alexa speaks for herself!! A great value for the money! Rockin and Headbanging.......

reviews.reviewTitle: Satisfied After One Year of Use
reviews.reviewText: This was our first Echo product (we've since added three more Echo Dots 3rd Gen). The sound quality from this device is really fantastic for the price tag. We have a 3,600 square foot house...a little over half is the bottom floor (open concept). It easily fills the bottom floor. Instead of buying smart bulbs, we've opted for buying close to 8 smart wifi plugs. Everything works so well that I hardly give commands a second thought. This is ideal and how technology should work.

OMG I LOVE ALEXA ECHO! How did I ever live without her! Connection was easy even for this dedicated Apple fan. I have my lights on schedules and can even turn them ALL on or off with a simple Alexa request. Seriously, if you are thinking about adding Alexa to your house...just do it!
I own over a half dozen different versions of the Echo devices. This is by far the best sounding echo I have. Good looking. Sounds good. Works great. Plus the smart hub works flawlessly.

Got this to replace the older version for smart home hub. Sound was improved, but also being able to control pretty much anything in one place is great. Had some older smart bulbs that used a discontinued hub, and the hub went out. They connected to the Echo Plus with no issues.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... in stereo pair with the sub. One issue: Audible books narration only plays through one speaker.
reviews.reviewText: I have the sub paired with two speakers in the kitchen. It’s great for listening to music. For some reason only one small speaker plays books with Audible. That needs to be fixed. Music and Alexa functionality is great.

Echo Plus works great, easy to set up. I can play music from multiple sources (Amazon, Pandora, Spotify). I can listen to tune in radio and I heart radio. The speakers sound good. I can set reminders, turn a light on and off (with included smart bulb) and get answers to most questions just by asking Alexa.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great item but order was wrong.
reviews.reviewText: Wrong Alexa came... Had to eat cost because I don't have time to deal with there issues. Have a cool pair now for stereo at least. Looks cool and sounds good. Bought a plus form another online store (odd a non Amazon store can send me the right item...)

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and works well as smart hub.
reviews.reviewText: I was a serious hold out on smart speakers. And I didn’t think Amazon had one with good sound until this year. This speaker is awesome, sounds great and works really well with my philips light bulbs and amazon smart plugs.

Much better audio & aesthetic form than the 1st gen Alexa Echo ... Built-in smart home hub works well too. Easy migration from a pre-setup 1st gen to this one... literally took me minutes to setup but took some deeper looks over the next 1-2 days to ensure my routines were migrated seamlessly too...

reviews.reviewTitle: Hi, I'm Alexa, and I have no idea what you're saying.
reviews.reviewText: The microphone on this device is horrible, and the sound quality on this isn't much better than that of my Echo Dot. It's noticeable, but not enough to justify the price point it's currently being sold for.
Tried every possible way to register/connect to wifi to no avail. Amazon's technology sucks. Returning asap.

Much better sound quality then with any of the previous echo dot models. The premium sound in this version of the echo plus is noticeably better and well worth the extra cost if you are using these speakers to listen to music in your home.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wrote one star review, Amazon CS called and addressed ASAP
reviews.reviewText: Sound is not any better than previous version. In fact in some ways it is worse. (One star.) Amazon CS called ASAP.( Five stars.) Device tested. Being sent back for full refund. (Current balance three starts. Will update review again after replacement is received.)

She does everything I ask from multiple timers during cooking to fully automating the house lights and watching TV. I also love playing music throughout the entire house on Alexa's Doters with Multi Speaker Setup. I really like the hub she has to quickly connect all my devices without the purchase a separate hub. She also controls my Vivint security automation system.

The premium in premium sound system is a terrible mislabel. The older version that my father-in-law has sounds much better. I got sucked in by wanting the newest and nicest. If you can buy an older refurb unit it will not only be about $50 cheaper but it'll work better and sound a good deal better. Disappointed in my purchase missed the window for return.

Love the flexibility of using Alexa. I have two Echo Dots but was hoping for a better sound, especially in the bass range. I am very pleased with the sound quality over the Dots, with the same reliability that the Dots have taught me to expect. I'm looking for new ways to use this technology and finding them every day.

I got this as a gift and I really liked it. One thing I didn’t like is that I can’t use YouTube or YouTube music on it. I have to get Spotify or Apple Music. But overall it’s great. I will also be using it for my home

reviews.reviewTitle: Bass sound improved - Treble is weaker than original.
reviews.reviewText: So the Bass sound is much improved over the original Echo. The treble response is quite a bit weaker though. I did a side by side comparison and it really depends on what you favor.

This has been a great addition to our home. Walking in with full hands and dogs, tell Alexa to turn on the light with the Phillip's Hues that came with it, and not tripping over my dogs! My kids can even add event schedules so they hit my phone! With 5 kids, I'm tickled!! LOL
Just an amazing speaker with fabulous sounds easy connect to your favorite music or radio station, turn on/off your lights, just with your voice. Very happy with this device - worth every penny!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: You won’t regret it..... Buy AMAZON and Save $$$ Merry Christmas and God Bless!
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful gift for my parents who have been there, done that... They haven’t experienced the fun and usefulness of have an Echo. My parents loved their Echo Dot so I upgraded them this year for the upgraded sound so they an hear throughout the house. Makes a wonderful gift for everyone.

After listening to music on the Dot, I am so blown away how good this sounds. I already sub to Amazon Music so I can listen to whatever I want whenever I want. I am so spoiled. My only complaint is I never got my free lightbulb even after calling about it. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
I really like having this in my home now. It makes setting an alarm for cooking easy. It is nice for playing music in the house too. Some of the games are fun you can play on it too.

I really do enjoy having this. It's been a lot of fun but there is so much yet to experience. I also like that I receive emails that give me pointers (ask Alexa to do ____, etc). I've just scratched the surface. The only downfall is having to buy a hub to get your home electronics (lamps, tv, stereo) to work. I haven't done that yet.
Wish they added built in Z-Wave support

There is a definite need for a "finer" (more than integer) adjustments to volume. For example, Volume 3 is often too loud, while Volume 2 is too soft. Can your engineers work on a 20-step volume control capability, e.g., Volume 2.5? Otherwise no complaints.

reviews.reviewTitle: love that I don't need to buy a hub for any smart home product.
reviews.reviewText: So far I love everything about it, playing music, setting timers, alarm clock, news, audio books, general knowledge questions, and she will even remember where you put things if you tell her to, which is great because I forget where I put things a lot, (getting old lol), I would definitely recommend this product for everyone.

I didn’t realize the amount of time or effort required to find the skills that you wish to use. As you scroll through the thousands of them and see something of interest, you have to start back at the very beginning of the list. That might be more of an app issue, but what is Alexa and Echo without the Alexa app! It’s a fun device. I like not having to get up to turn on the lamp too!
What have we become? Lol

The echo plus has great sound quality,And I don’t even have it hooked to other speakers. I also have an Echo Dot third generation and the sound quality is not as good as the echo +2nd generation. The color choices are also great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Syncs easy with other smart products
reviews.reviewText: This speaker works as expected. I replaced my dot for better sound quality and use this speaker in the kitchen. It synced up with the smart light bulb super easy. I enjoy Alexa, especially when I'm cooking and need to know a measurement equivalent, etc.

Love love love! It does everything I wanted and more. Paired it with a dot upstairs and a smart plug. I can’t wait to get some lightbulbs and start some routines. The speakers are amazing if a little bass heavy but are easy to adjust. I love making lists while cooking and then having the list on my phone while shopping.

Hesitated for a long time, because I had Sonos One. I wish I hadn't. So great to have native Alexa and a great speaker for music. I don't miss the Sonos One at all. And the Zigbee Hub is a nice bonus.

The quality of sound is great, especially for that price. Now if you compare it Bose, forget it. Bose is in a different league. I am impressed with the product and looking forward to continue to make my home into a smart home with security.

Very pleased with our Echo Plus~ it’s nice to not deal with CD’s, and music is voice activated, so convenient!😊 And it’s small enough that it doesn’t take up too much counter space. We would definitely recommend this Echo!!!

We haven’t disliked anything. It was a little bit of a learning process just to add new devices to it but it works great for radio, news, listening to Amazon music (great quality) and turning lights & devices off and on.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very cool very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product this was the start of my smart home and since then I've upgraded everything. I now have 18 Smart Wi-Fi devices Samsung SmartThings and an ecobee plus all connected to this. This is a cool thing.

It is very useful, especially when you get home and the house is dark, you can tell her to turn on the lights, or if you want to hear music, you can tell her to play that music or if you are already settled and feeling a little warm, you can have her turn on a fan. It is very convenient.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa has lots of info, but not all
reviews.reviewText: Alexa is pretty cool, but am surprised how much she doesn't know. Still, the unit is very cool and helpful, especially with playing music. Just don't ask her to give you a weather report from NOAA, as she can't, and I was disappointed in this.

Great sound, but cannot understand, even after I went through the voice recognition phase several times. I should have went with Google and not waste my money. I will be replacing with the Google Home. This has 7 mircophones and still acts like it's retarded. I have to yell and scream at it and it still doesn't understand.
Great for playing music, setting alarms, making announcements. I’ve also linked some smart light bulbs to it. Alexa doesn’t seem as smart as google home but it pairs well with everything.

I love being able to find out what the weather will be like. It's also great using it as my wake-up call. I discovered that I have to be specific when I ask a question. I asked Alexa to play Pink's "Try" then I asked Alexa to play "Try" again. Apparently, there's a song titled, "Try Again"! LOL I learned something new.

Got a 3rd generation echo dot (heather grey, love the look) first to use with a fire stick in my bedroom. That little dot exceeded my expectations so much (sound quality, responsiveness, and functionality) I got the 2nd generation Echo Plus for my living room. I have some minor gripes but nothing that would sway me away from buying it over again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't know how I lived without it
reviews.reviewText: I love the ease of use. I ordered it for my work-at-home office so I could listen to music. The sound is fantastic. I set reminders, timers, check the weather and absolutely love the shopping list feature. Wish I'd bought it sooner

reviews.reviewTitle: Not so good on listening/ mics
reviews.reviewText: I like all of my other echo devices but this one just doesn’t listen. I don’t know if it’s the device or the new version but it doesn’t pick me up very well. The dot further down the room hears better than this one. :/ I’m kind of sad about it.

My son bought me this for Christmas. I have used it only for listening to Amazon music. I like being able to skip songs or request my favorites. No commercials are a plus too! Bought the smart plug but have not used this yet.

Overall a great speaker and much better sound that the original (can actually hear some bass). Would compare the sound to that of say a Bose Soundlink mini.

Setup was easy and the built in Hub makes adding smart home items easy.

I did purchase this along side a Phillips hue. Know that they will work with out the Phillips hue hub but for only basic features. If you want to change the color/hue then you need the Hue Bridge.

This is my second Alexa. My first is a Dot with a Harmon Kardon Onyx Studio speaker. This Echo Plus, for the master bedroom, eliminates the need for a decent speaker as the sound is very good. I love these things

I finally ordered an Echo and welcomed Alexa into my home. The speaker/ sound quality is excellent. I use it to listen to music frequently, to check the weather and drive time before I leave the house, and I use it as my alarm and to set reminders. Being able to ask it random questions - like math calculations- is also great!
Alexa has taken the place of using my cellphone for all of those functions while at home and I can do it w/o searching for my phone.

Took this piece of junk out of the box. Downloaded the app onto my phone. App can't find device. Instructed to call. I have called 4 times. About 10 mins on hold each time then disconnected. I am about ready to throw this piece of junk against the wall. I suggest someone on your end get in touch with me. I am VERY unhappy and frustrated right now!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Give Alexa time to learn about you and your preferences
reviews.reviewText:
So far so good... Alexa does require a bit of a learning curve when asking for restaurants and other eating establishments... when asking for nearest sandwich shops she gave me different locations of only one sandwich shop...

However, while setting up my home network, lighting, and smart tv, it is AMAZING!!!! Everything is voice controlled and is flawless.

The best sounding Echo device, small footprint, and very easy to set up hub built in. We bought two for stereo in our living room, providing good soundstage and better depth to our music. Highly recommended, worth the additional cost over the basic Echo.

i like having this. it is handy! it's definitely helped with some hard to reach light switches, and the speaker is pretty good. i can put it near my open window and listen to music outside on my balcony. i'm glad i purchased it.
Great product. We listen to music, get information from it, get reminders and many other things. Turn the lights off and on and more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Navigation is convoluted to get what o want /need music or
reviews.reviewText:
Sound is very good. Is not too big so I can put it on a small night table.
Dislike: there’s no turntable ring to volume up or down ( like in the old ecos ) without the need to open up Alexa app or press buttons on eco plus or minus buttons.

The sound quality is great. Alexa works okay, but is variable--sometimes I whisper to myself across the room and it picks up on it and other times I'm yelling right next to it. The thing that really kills me is if I have it bluetooth connected to my computer because I'm watching a video/lecture/movie the sound lags BIG TIME. It's such a pain. Something that costs this much shouldn't have this problem. If this is your intended use I would recommend something that connects directly.

This product is excellent for listening to music from any genre or any era.
My con would bbe that you must buy the battery pack separate. Would be much better
if the battery pack was included in the basic price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best product to come out in years
reviews.reviewText: If I could teach Alexa to do my laundry and give me a... back rub I would marry her! This product is life changing when integrated with smart home products. Well done amazon
Sound quality compared to the echo dot is not that much better

I am truly enjoying my Echo Plus( 2nd Gen).
I can listen to music from whatever era I like. Play trivia games, news, weather,etc.
There is so much it can do that I haven't done yet. But, I can't wait. My children enjoy asking her questions and singing when their song is playing. Sound is clear and awesome. I like the color also. Great gift idea.
The sound on this is awesome place for such a little speaker

I like the color and size . After a few weeks you don’t even notice it’s there anymore. I like that the unit has a lot of capabilities, it’s very cool to listen to whatever I want, even specific songs or artists. Having it control smart plugs and switches is a super bonus. Only downside is you kinda gotta raise your voice volume for it to hear you. Kinda in the manner you have to tell a kid to behave ; firm and clear but not yelling. Definitely can’t speak in the same volume as a normal conversation.
The sound quality is good for what it is. I've been impressed with the way that Alexa continues improving and developing new skills. Overall this works exactly how I wanted/expected!

reviews.reviewTitle: Shes A.I. and she won't be ignored.
reviews.reviewText: She spell checks, gives news updates, weather, she can tell jokes and order more products online, as well as adjust the temperature in the room and turn lights on and off. The list is endless. So far so good.

I really enjoy playing with Alexa and her features. The only thing that gets frustrating is that sometimes when you try to use some of the custom routines, she doesn't remember them and says, "I'm sorry I don't know that."

It is really frustrating when the technology begins to control you. Rather than me controlling Alexa, it seems she is controlling me and I am not happy. Too much work involved in dealing with this level of technology. I am ready to send back. I needed to speak directly with a technician to get it started because the directions were not clear. One simple instruction given to me by the technician is not posted in the directions. I am so done and truly not happy.
Ruth
I liked the sound. Two speakers really make a difference.

reviews.reviewTitle: The sound and bass fills the room! I was shocked
reviews.reviewText: The richness and bass was so intense I had to turn it down lol. I love this little speaker, and the voice recognition is better than my Amazon Tap, which is a great portable speaker Amazon offers. :)

What a wonderful thing to have. I was visiting my daughter and fell in love with it. I ordered as soon as I came home and love it every single day. Finally I can get a voice activated "helper". Thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for a few things, great sound!
reviews.reviewText: It has great sound and it's super convenient to be voice activated. I hooked it up to the light bulbs which is also convenient. However, it's a lot of money to spend just for voice activated things you can turn on manually.

reviews.reviewTitle: still learning but love it so far
reviews.reviewText: I'm surprised at the sound quality of the Echo Plus (2nd Gen). I'm no audio guru, but in my opinion it has the sound quality similar to a Bose speaker. I bought the version that comes with the Hue light. That was easy to pair up and use.

I had always wondered what it would be like to be the owner of an Amazon Alexa. I finally made that leap and purchased 2 Echo Plus towers and 1 Echo Dot. Let me tell you guys, these things sound amazing! I am amazed at how well the microphones pick up your voice when you a command is spoken to Alexa. The music that comes out of these units are clear and precise. I had no idea on how easy they are to set up. Take a gamble like I did and get yourselves one or two or three or four! They Rock!

I'm very satisfied with this product, I was debating on whether I should buy it but after I got it, I know I spent my money well. Its completely replaced my big stereo system, I used to have to connect my laptop with a AUX cord which meant I had to be close to my stereo, but since the echo has Bluetooth I can connect it wirelessly. It's also great with being my new alarm clock, I can just say what time I want to get up and it does all the work for me.
What a great device. Great sound quality and voice recognition! There are SO MANY WAYS to utilize the echo and Alexa, I highly recommend looking at the weekly "What's new, Alexa?" Emails!

I like it sound quality is great however the microphone is better than my older ones and it takes over and likes to only play on that speaker maybee it’s a setting I can’t find but for some reason the the new one thinks I only want to use it lol

I really do love this speaker. The speaker sounds fantastic but it disconnects from bluetooth all the time and randomly shuts off. My old echo dot used to play music until I told it to stop this one just shuts off and disconnects itself from bluetooth devices all the time. Its very frustrating.

reviews.reviewTitle: WATCH OUT IF YOU OWN A DOG
reviews.reviewText: Set up this afternoon, my dog was so terrified he broke down a gate to go hide on another floor of the house. The item is packed up but he won't come back inside from going to the bathroom, even after the device has been repackaged for hours.
I bought this specifically because it has a built in hub which I thought would supplant the Philips Hue hub. It only gives limited Hue capability.

Sound is fuller and richer than the 1st generation Echo plus. Only issue I have is pairing one of my echo remotes with it. The remotes pair easily with my other echoes. Overall, pleased with this purchase.
Purchased on Prime day at a great deal. I have multiple alexa devices, but sometimes this one picks up when I using a different one. Sound is better than the others.

reviews.reviewTitle: Song pauses every time it plays
reviews.reviewText: Sound is good, it stops every 1:48 seconds and is silent for 10 seconds EVERY song we play. We assumed it was a WiFi issue, but got an echo dot and it works great. No issues. Amazon troubleshot and said we’re escalating to their next level Echo team. This was over a week ago and we haven’t heard back. I guess we shouldn’t have assumed it was a WiFi issue and reached out sooner. We are just stuck with it now after 8 months of having the product and the same thing happening from day one.
This is a great device! My husband has recently lost his vision and this has been a very useful tool for him. Plus, the kids and I can use it and it’s pretty easy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stay away from Echo plus, last less than a year
reviews.reviewText: I didn't get a chance to start using until January this year and today about 10 months of service it just died. No power or recognition with no warning. This is the most unreliable piece of crap that I have bought from Amazon with no recourse....

I was hoping this would replace my Bose Color Soundwave and be an all-in-one device. Yeah, no. I was disappointed. It’s a great looking speaker and functions fantastically for Alexa but lacks bass and rich sound quality you get from even a entry level Bose.

Great product so far, only had a little while, but the hands free calling worked great, asking about the time and weather works great, Alexa hears me and has never done any oops. Hope it keeps up the good work

I like the flexibility and am impressed with the number of things it can do. I really like being able to use it with smart bulbs and turn my lights on, off, or dim them. I like the music streaming feature as well. It's very cool!

reviews.reviewTitle: Black friday deal gone wrong....support fixed issue
reviews.reviewText: I'd swear I bought a bundle deal that had an echo plus and a Phillip's light. No light. Anyway amazon gave me a credit for the bulb.

Just an FYI Best Buy has a concierge service for free. You Buy, they show you what you can do with it. Ask the Geek squad and no i do not work for Best Buy. we now control lights Phillip HUE , Thermostat NEST, and security ARLO along with Music, Traffic, Weather. Alexa is a lot of fun. Best part; when i go to sleep I tell her to turnoff all lights which includes the one I forgot in the Garage.
Get a Dot for each bedroom / office you love em.

My Alexa purchase is doing me well! I got surprised on the sound quality, it sounds loud and amazing. I have it set-up with my LED lights and lights and listens to every command and communicates efficiently. The only two issues: Alexa will have a hard time detecting your voice if playing something at max value. Also, it will not detect your voice if you say “Alexa, (anything)” decently fast!

Great for playing music immediately, no more turning on several devices to navigate to a music app or YouTube. Also able to play rain or ocean sounds for night time ambience. Got it for my wife, she enjoys the ease of use. The sound quality is pretty good; however it doesn't get "bust your eardrums loud" nor is it for audiophiles. Good buy for on-the-fly tunes, as well as for many many more useful abilities to be utilized.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sounds so much better than Gen 1 and 2
reviews.reviewText: It's great and it was cheap, like 22 bucks at the time. Price is up now but still worth replacing your old Gen 1 and 2 Dots. Sound is so much better than the previous models.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does it all - Ditch the blinking box
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy with this product. Why buy another blinking box if your Echo Plus can do it all? The idea of having a separate blinking box in the form of a hub made me crazy. I get the hub and great functionality in the Echo Plus. Win win

I love playing music and at night I can go to sleep listening to birds chirping, rain and thunder or ocean sounds...Can't wait till have one I can take in my car. I could play whatever my Uber/Lyft riders want to hear
It really changed the house. We are listening to all the songs we love. The sound quality is amazing ! We were so in love with it that we got a second one for a different floor in the house

I only bought this to listen to music since i don't have a radio, but oh my. She has become an awesome little roommate to have around LOL!!! I even had her sing happy birthday to me since no one else did. She did a great job! She has some cute jokes too.

My most fantastic purchase ever. Got this on. Black Friday special. Great sound. With Amazon Music Unlimited I was able to eliminate all my old stereo equipment/speakers/CD’s, etc. I added the latest Echo Dot to my bedroom and now have all my favorite music and great sound everywhere.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very happy with my Echo Plus!
reviews.reviewText: I held off buying and echo because I didn't think I would use it much. But now that I have it I wish I had bought one years ago. I now have 3 echos along with smart plugs and a smart light.

So convenient to get many of the functions of my phone without getting the phone out. Always learning more. Love the custom responses that can be programmed in. Now I can adjust the house temperature ad light by voice.
So far so good love it. Allows input in so I can connect to my tv which is what I wanted. Good sound and it's surprisingly smaller. Much smaller than the 1st one but better sound
I love Alexa! She helps me organize, coordinate, and remember the small things in my daily routine. She even provides some entertainment and news. Great little LADY!

Works great for what I needed. I like not needing to buy the extra hub to use the smart light. Also I can pair it with my previously used fire tablet HD 10 via Bluetooth so it can play sound for movies on it. Nice sound quality.
I have a couple of the older models, they just keep getting better. This one looks great, sounds much better nd hears my voice requests it seems from anywhere.

Mostly used so far to play music.
Keep shopping list.
Reminders.
Fairly easy to set up, but easy to get sidetracked by barrage of ads from everywhere !!!

I love this product. I was considering an Ihome because the reviews said the sound was the best; however, when you compare cost and the actual product the Echo Plus has GREAT sound. It’s also extremely easy to install. I am very happy with this purchase.

Even though I'm enjoying the Echo Plus, very disappointed that it will not play Pandora Shuffle. This was a key reason to order the Echo Plus so I would not have to use my phone or the Pandora App through Fire Stick, enabling better sound. Guess a sound bar for the t.v. is in my future. Otherwise, Alexa is alright!
I don’t know why but I have to yell at it so it can talk. The one in my kitchen and in my room listen when I speak but this one for some reason I have to yell. She’s not a good listener

reviews.reviewTitle: Still working out what I really think of Alexa
reviews.reviewText: I thought that I would use it more. I'm still trying to find out Alexa's real place in our live. The kids love to shout, "Alexa, play "My Little Pony". Nice full sound out of the speaker.

I also have a couple echo dots and can talk to everyone in the house play music throughout the house. It's always there when I need it and functionality with other alexa enabled devices makens everything simple.

Love the new Echo Plus with the built in hub. Easy to use and program. Syncs well with ease with other Alexa products. I use it to turn the lights on at my home. Mostly for the músic as I used the echo though out the home... I love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Plus (2nd Gen) is definitely an Improvement over 1st Gen Echos
reviews.reviewText:
Echo Plus (2nd Gen) is definitely an Improvement over 1st Gen Echos
But NOT the Sound Quality that I had
Hoped for.
Reasonable Size & Excellent Functionality
when used for an Alexa Interface !

We have had our Echo Plus for about 2 weeks now and could not be more pleased. Alexa is right on point with everything that we have asked of her and the sound quality is terrific coming out of this small unit. Highly recommend!!!
Love this new version. Sound is excellent and fills my living room. I have a home theater sound system but never use it to play music. I find the Echo is easier and sounds great by itself.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works excellent. Have not had a single problem. Fun and useful.
reviews.reviewText: Still working on it but so far love it. Have not bought a lot of extras for it yet. Only have a light that works perfectly when coming downstairs in dark. Use a lot for my grocery lists. Can’t wait to get a few more things to attach.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as great as I thought it would be
reviews.reviewText: I have an original echo. I thought this new one would be wonderful. Other than a different shape and fabric covering I find no change even with the sound.
Use it every day for many different things, mostly scheduled routines and playing music. Great sound. Have it connected with light bulbs too. Easy to use.
I love the sound on the speakers. It is a great integration with Alexa. It did take some time to get used to the voice volume control. I’ll probably get one for each of the kids rooms.
I can’t get it to coordinate with a Netvue baby cam, and for some reason, announces the person or phone number after a phone call is made and there is no phone Alexa component attached
Just got this speaker today and love it might get another one so I can stero pair them but if your thinking about getting one of these don't think no more get one
I don’t have enough nice things to say about this! Great sound quality! Great volume! I am having fun getting to know the different ways Alexa can help me!

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Plus - A nice upgrade to the original Echo
reviews.reviewText: Fuller sound than non plus Echo. I like the temperature sensing feature which you can program it to notify you if you house temperature crossing your threshold temp.

This is my first Alexa enabled device, but my family and I like it a lot. I will be getting a couple Echo Dots for the kids.....and me so I can call them to dinner or drop in on them when they don't answer thier phones.

These units rely on a mesh network, one per speaker actually, and as such voice commands are not automatic and instant as with the Echo Dot Three. The only way I can get reliable volume changes is with the hard buttons on top of the speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Same Old Alexa With a Better Look
reviews.reviewText: The newer Echo is a nicer looking model. I believe it also has better sound than the old one. It interfaces with Alexa just fine and I have no complaints whatsoever.

I absolutely love Alexa! So easy! It's just awesome! I have the echo dot already and Alexa Show is on the way! Love that I can voice control my house! Thanks Alexa! Impatiently awaiting for the Alexa Auto invite!
It’s doesnt know it top volume, middle volumes, low volume. So you can’t ask to goto it right always. Limited on stuff

Love the devise but it's very sensitive if you have two close together. I have one in the family room and living room and sometimes the other will pick up the request. Overall I'm still learning the features that are available but so far so good.
I started out with a small echo dot and purchased this for my game room. Sound is great and controls my lights perfect its a shame the sub woofer is so much or I would buy that also

The write up should have stated you can't sync these speakers as one; like the echo dot.
Had I known this up front, I would never have bought them . I tried returning them w/my receipt & invoice @ the Khols on 3715 Ellison Rd NW, but the clerk was not helpful after speaking to a different clerk the previous day & being told all I needed was the invoice; so I just left the speakers @ Kohl's
Upgraded from the original Alexa and like it very much!

I love my Echo Plus. The bass is much better than I expected from a device this small. I think the price is still too high, but the quality is excellent. We use it every day and it has replaced the radios in the house.

It worked fine for 3 months, then stopped, and I was told by Amazon that it is passed its return date. Actually I had it for 6 months when I was told that there was nothing they could do so I gave it 1star. Not being satisfied I THEN decided to check the warranty and call customer service again. CS sent a new power cord, the unit works great again for our purposes, and I would give it a 5 star.

Nice looking device. Sound quality is better, with more bass than the 1st generation echo. Good for casual listening/background music but not quite there yet for premium sound. I do like this device at this price point. It is responsive, picks up voice commands well, looks good, and has decent sound. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: It has a great ear, even if you whisper.
reviews.reviewText: Still learning it’s uses but, voice recognition can be close or far from the device. Loud or soft. Even from another room. I have no smart home devices yet to test. I have a older ring doorbell that does not interface, but the current ones do. It has an internal Zigbee hub and many devices do connect. I have not tried to connect my water heater yet, in the water heater app has some connection to the Echo.
Sounds great and looks good in the living room. I had the original Echo and thought the second would be nice. I like being able to add light bulbs and outlets to it.
Voice control is one of those things you will wonder how you got along without. The first time you walk into a dark room with your hands full and say, Alexa turn on the lamp, you will never go back.

I have 2 Echo Plus’s connected to a Echo sub and it sounds really good and easy to control. Plays my Amazon music great. I want to buy another for our room but have to wait until it goes on sale again
Absolute garbage. Constant pairing & Bluetooth issues. The Alexa app is absolutely awful & constantly freezes. Really disappointed in the limitations of this device.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really good sound and so easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: My first experience with a smart speaker and home hub is working out well. Easy to set up all the components. I have this working with an echo dot, several smart light bulbs and a smart plug. Easy to set them all up and a breeze to use. My only frustration is being able to stream my favorite radio stations on both speakers at once. They are on radio.com and for some inexplicable reason it just doesn’t work. Please fix this!!!!

We love this product. The only thing when playing music it shuts off sometimes. Not sure why. We listen to music all day long and we can get updated weather reports. We have asked her many questions and get great answers.
Great product, love it. This is my first one. the only problem was after I ordered it the product went down seven dollars in price. The sound is great

We are really enjoying the music. A little frustrating at times when requesting certain artists but I'm sure Amazon is working to improve the app and with time things will improve. We are very satisfied.

This thing is great. Except if you wanted to search or ask Alexa to search something. She will quickly tell you she doesn't know. I heard she uses Wikipedia for sources, which we all know is the LEAST credible place for anything. She can't search Google, Yahoo, Bing, Safree, FireFox, or Internet Explorer. That's a major down side. You should probably get the Google Home if you wanted everything Alexa can do and Google home Searches using GOOGLE.

reviews.reviewTitle: Only slightly better than regular echo
reviews.reviewText: Sounds better than the regular echo but distorts out an any volume over 6 or 7. Has ok bass and works well to play music in my office. Not sure it was worth the money to upgrade

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well but need more to fully enable
reviews.reviewText: So far the Echo has worked well for questions and information but we cannot get the full experience (as we have seen at other folks house) without additional purchases for smart devices, smart plugs, Amazon music (or other options), etc. If you already have all these options it should work great, else you need to spend more to make echo more than a glorified toy.
I was wrong....not an amazing device. You cannot use your own PURCHASED sounds to set alarms and reminders OR EVEN use in routines....CONTROL FREAKS! Sending back!

reviews.reviewTitle: It sounds better than the Echo, and it works with the Phillips Hue lamp
reviews.reviewText: It works well, and sounds better than the Echo. I also have a couple of (pricier) Sonos One speakers, and indeed, they sound much better, but if you can get it on sale for $109.00 including the Phillips Hue lamp, it's a fair value.

Compared to the first gen, it just looks better. The bass is barely better, and I don’t like that I can’t adjust the volume by spinning the top. This one you can only press the volume button. Seems like a downgrade honestly

We have several echos at home and while they are all performing within what you can expect from this technology today this unit delivers no doubt the best sound of any of them. Not at a level where I would get read of stereo speakers to listen to music at a higher level volume but good enough for every day use around the house. Good design also over the last generations.
My son bought this for me for mother’s day. I love it! So fun and easy to set up and use. I’m excited to buy the outlets and other accessories for our house!

I went out and bought electrical outlets and wireless bulbs to work with my Alexa(2nd) generation device which was advertised as being Alexa friendly. Neither of them worked and alexa would not discover them. When I call Amazon to open a ticket, the rep was great and tried to help. However, when I called back 2 days later to follow-up on the ticket (went to developers) the tech hung up on me. I am thinking abaout ditching my Alexa and go with a google device.
This is way cooler than I thought it would be. I was easily able to add my front door lock to it and some other electronica items for Alexa to control. Easy Peasy
I haven’t had it long enough to unleash all its capabilities. I ask it weather daily. The quiz of the day. The word of the day and play several learning games daily. Her knowledge is endless
I bought this for a "hub" for my ring doorbell. It isn't. Alexa will not answer the doorbell when it rings. Not sure what I need to get to make this happen. Anyway, the sound is great.

reviews.reviewTitle: The sound is incredible out of this device!
reviews.reviewText: I like the price. It wasn't too high. The size of the device is not too big or small. I like the fact that you can change out the sleeve. It has played every song I have asked it to play. If I had to say anything negative about it, it would be the search engine on it. I haven't got to buy any devices to go with the Echo yet, but I plan on it. As far as setup goes, I couldn't ask for anything more simple! It was such a breeze to install! Thank you Amazon!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to set up and use
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift from my son and I have really enjoyed using it. Alexa is very responsive and the sound quality is great for streaming music. I still smile every time I ask Alexa to turn on a lamp and it happens...like magic! Great gift!
These new ecos have improved greatly on voice recognition and sound. Great product I use everyday to control various appliances at home. I have 3 ecos and 2 spots.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to Install, Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Great little speaker for the money. I put this one in my 900 SF one bedroom apartment and it is loud enough to fill the entire space. Also easy to install, basically unpack, turn on, and follow the prompts on your iPhone. I liked this Echo Plus so much that I also bought my parents one for Xmas. We both use our Echo+ every day for streaming music, checking news, podcasts, and more.

It was very easy to set up and pair with my other electronics. If you buy one, be sure and set up your shopping list or to-do list and pair with your smartphone. It is awesome and you never have to write down a list again.

Great device, have great potential, very sensitive voice recognition from most rooms in the house, and the sound is outstanding. Great product will purchase one or two more to increase access to the whole house. Highly recomend.

Only one dislike - You have to use your smartphone for initial set up. The problem is that the instructions don't tell you that you have to use your smartphone for initial set up.
