So far everything else is a big like.

Amazed at the quality of sound! Surprised that I needed Prime for basic music and an extra purchase for more specific modes of music. Alexa does needs little more knowledge... not a replacement for google, maybe some day.
So far I’ve been happy. Had the previous generation one and after one year it stopped working. As long as this one lasts longer it will be good. Does more things than the last generation one

Love the Echo plus. I have paired it with Hue lighting and Nest thermostats to control the environment in my house. Certainly, there's a lot more to explore. So far, I love having the echo plus in my home.
Sounds great(better than standard Echo), looks great and works well with my Apple Music, Pandora and XM subscriptions. Alexa is a lot of fun. Can’t imagine that anyone would dislike this.
New Alexa sounds really nice. Deep bass tones and the sound carries well. I had a dot in the kitchen, it’s more suited for a small office or bathroom.

reviews.reviewTitle: We have only had it 2 days and we already love it
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. We use it for music and weather and news reports and to turn on and off all the lights we use every day. I am sure we will learn to use it for more things after we have it longer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good, but stereo pairing drops occasionally
reviews.reviewText: It could have been 5 stars if the stereo pairing drops occasionally. Not sure why. I have to tell Alexa to start playing my station to get it back.
This is my 2nd Echo and my 1st Echo Plus. Has a more rich sound for larger rooms and the added hub allows you to quickly add smart devices like the Hue light.

I was pleased with the increase in sound quality over the standard 2nd gen echo. It was worth double the price to me but ymmv.
Update, I bought a 2nd and replaced another echo. Sales happen

reviews.reviewTitle: Got two of them. The quality is noticeably better than the 2 gen echo!
reviews.reviewText: These are phenomenal! The cleanness of the sound quality and the bass response with them just by themselves is already fantastic. But when you add the subwoofer, it changes your whole experience of music! It’s incredible!

reviews.reviewTitle: Better sound and better voice recognition.
reviews.reviewText:
I’m replacing the original Echo. Sound is much approved especially base.
Voice recognition also seems better when in a noisy environment.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound quality is excellent, Wi-Fi reception not so good.
reviews.reviewText: Replaced an echo dot with the plus. In same exact location, am disappointed in Wi-Fi reception as it seems to lose signal and cut out quite a lot. Sound is great - when it works.
I had to replace my first generation echo is because they kept dropping from Wi-Fi. The new latest version is perfect and we’ve had no problems.
Bought this unit for music. Sounds really good for its size. Of course we get weather, news and whatever else we need from it. Would buy again.

I upgraded from the first Echo, which I owned since around initial release. I was happy with it, but decided to utilize the trade-in offer. The sound is noticeably better, especially in the low end. I have not tested the smart hub as I already have that covered.
The sound is great! I love the temp feature that controls a couple space heaters when needed. Having the hub built in has made a big difference too for smart home device choices.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love my Echo and I’m not IT or social
reviews.reviewText: Love this product ....if you are questioning whether you need an Echo... you do! Great for everything from weather, music, Amazon updates of orders etc!

I was given the Echo for Christmas last year, and have now been using it for almost nine months. I LOVE it. I listen to my favorite radio station through it with good sound quality. I've added smart devices and have been able to set up several routines that make it so easy to control my environment, even without going into a full smart home. It has been one of the best gifts I have ever received.
Great sound come out of this little speaker. Our family has fallen in love with Alexa. We find ourselves telling Alexa good morning everyday. I wish we didnt have to pay for Amazon music per month.

I am really enjoying this device. Have connected approx 10 lights, my Trane Nexia system and purchased a book to be read to me. And the music is great. I also purchased and echo dot and equally as please with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sub Woofer Stereo Sub Pair not Compatible with Fire TV
reviews.reviewText: Sub Woofer Stereo Sub Pair not Compatible with Fire TV

Works well. App has all the instructions but you have to go through a lot to get all the information to set up and use. Be sure you set PIN if you link to Amazon account. Need to be able to change the name for ordering from Alexis to your choice to prevent accidental orders.
Fantastic sound, better than my Bose Bluetooth speakers. All other functions including smart hub working as intended. Happy with the purchase.

This was a joint Christmas gift, for my husband and I, to ourselves. We absolutely love it! So does our 2yr old. It does everything we need it too. We are a music family, so Alexa does not disappoint. Recently started using Spotify to stream music through the device.
I traded in my Echo (1st Gen) for the Echo Plus (2nd Gen). Voice recognition is excellent and the sound quality is wonderful. It was a great decision to upgrade to the next Generation.

Sometime it seems like Alexa goes to sleep and when I try to get her to respond she won’t. She recognizes my voice, but won’t perform the request or respond back at all. I love the sound quality when I can get her to play.

reviews.reviewTitle: Premium sound is not so premium
reviews.reviewText: I gave it only 3 stars because I bought it for the better sound quality and I was disappointed. I also miss the volume control on the previous generation.
This is the sound, lows, I was looking for. Much improved from the 1st gen, but I was surprised how well the Gen 1 sounded even at loud volumes. I am more than pleased with the Gen 2 model.

Sound quality is not like Bose but still good. All other “smart” features are awesome. When I call my people who are home and they don’t pick up, right from my phone I can do drop in and talk to them through echo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mics in previous version were better
reviews.reviewText: This generation does not hear commands as well as previous. I feel like I have to yell at it where previous model seems to hear everything.

I purchased the Home Hub and three Dots. Set up was very easy and integration of the Dots to the Hub was a breeze. Setting up the Hub and Dots as a speaker system was easy but I did have to search the internet for the instructions. I was also able to integrate it with our Nest thermostat and Alarm.com system. Love the product
I love the Echo Plus! Great sound quality, voice recognition is fantastic, the look of the unit is top-notch. It's a great value for the quality of the device.

This is my first Alexa device, so I can not compare it to anything. The product was really easy to set up. I use it with philips hue bulbs, which syncs really well. The sound on the speaker is amazing and the microphones work well, Alexa has no problem hearing me. I am very happy with this item. Just one thing; as of now I only use it for a couple of light bulbs and music, so I do not yet know how the item will work and sync with multiple devices.
This is a great little powerful speaker. Works great! Love it! Sound quality is great. From time to time, I've had issues with Alexa responding though. Not too often.

I was skeptical about buying an Alexa device although I had been wanting one for a few years now. This is hands down the best purchase I’ve made in a while. I LOVE it. The sound of the echo plus is amazing. I use it primarily for music and I just adore it.

I had a Bose wireless speaker that has been starting to act up. I bought this and it has comparable sound using Alexa to skip songs and change playlists is so much easier that going to my phone to do it. This was a great investment, hope it lasts.

I had echo dot 2 before. It didn't work good. Sometime it didn't catch my commands. It was pretty weak. So I decided to trade it. I got 25% off new echo with that. So I bought the echo plus. The device came perfect. The sound excellent. And It does catch my command more. And I really enjoy the free phillips hue with it. So far nothing to complain. I give it five stars.
This is our second echo plus, for our bedroom. We like Alexa :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Cool, but my 1st Gen Echo Dot works smoother
reviews.reviewText:
So, I spent $150 on this device for my 1st Gen Echo Dot to connect faster and smoother to my Spotify?? It's even in a much further room to the wifi!
I bought some smart lights but it's EXTREMELY limited to the abundance of controls it offers.

Also, when are we going to get multiple commands in a single sentence. For $150, it's just not worth it the extra money

reviews.reviewTitle: Great device! Wish it was easier to figure out how to add music content
reviews.reviewText: Love the device itself and the good sound quality - but I wish I could more easily figure out how to add music selections and variety to it without paying a bunch of extra money each month.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy connect but doesn't share well
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to add are haikus light bulbs and other devices to the echo hub. The downside is we use SmartThings as well an items added to the hub are not shared with SmartThings

reviews.reviewTitle: Can’t wait to get it working.
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t been able to set it up for some reason, but I expect it to work great. It’s loud enough to hear from anywhere in the house and it can hear well to
I love it ! I can leave messages to my daughter's that lives out of state. I love the Amazon music as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: All additional features you have to purchase
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize that even though you have a subscription to Sirius you have to purchase the streaming through Sirius. Only downfall is you have to purchase other features. I haven't been able to get all the accessories for lights and locks yet. that is my next goal.
sounds very good for a stand alone speaker but not as good as I thought it would. It is a little better than a plain echo but not by leaps and bounds

I'm still learning what this devices capabilities are, so my best suggestion is to be patient with it. So far its really cool and its doing the things I want in regard to making my home a smart home. Understand, having the Echo is just the start and the other peripherals add more cost to this endeavor but I think it will be worth it, especially since the Echo Plus has the smarthome program.

If you have the 1st Gen Echo this is a must upgrade. Its half-size as the first Alexa and the sound has way more kick
I recommend getting this

the sound is really good.
now the ZigBee thing? Its O.K...
You cannot do much with the Philips lamps for instance, but at the same time it can do some basic stuff other hubs struggle with (like Phillips hue having no groups, only rooms)

reviews.reviewTitle: Does work the hub part do not buy
reviews.reviewText: Already have an echo and bought this one because the description said “hub” but apparently not the hub you need to find your smart things in your home. Waste my money for nothing, I think my google assistant is way better then this echo that does control my smart things on can make video call is worthless
What is not to love about Alexa? All you could want and more. Always something new. It is a very important piece in our smart home. Very entertaining too.

reviews.reviewTitle: New Echo is Pretty Dern Good!
reviews.reviewText: I dig my new Echo, sounds really good, it's got some power to carry me successfully through the soundtrack of my life and beyond. Dig big.

I finally bought a 2nd Gen Echo after my several 1st Gen Echos stopped working in January related to a software update. Amazon said they were working on the issue but it is still unresolved in Mid-April. They in effect force you to buy a newer model to boost sales. I would have switched away from Amazon but had too many other devises.Will continue to look at other options.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not much different than SIRI, Can’t play my Apple Music files!
reviews.reviewText: I would have given it 5 ⭐️ if I could play my iPhone music files thru Alexa WITHOUT having to pay the monthly music fee to Apple 😩 So I just take the extra step and Bluetooth my iPhone music files to Alexa.
Disappointed the hub doesn’t work with smart TVs that was the reason we got it- beware Alexa hub does NOT work with Samsung smart TVs, had to go back to Harmony hub(which is a pain).

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound quality at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: I have a few of these spread throughout my house and really enjoy the sound when they are all playing. And with multiple music provider options it is hard to beat. The home automation works as expected, I have a few different brands of smart outlet plugs and it works with all of them with no issues. The only issue I have right now is that the Amazon Alexa app is slow to respond at times, but hopefully Amazon can get that fixed.
It's OK. It definitely doesn't have all the answers but it's not bad. It's something nice to have but not something that people need.
O.K. Google is Free on My Android, and Sound better looking. Worthless , My Parrott give me better.
LOVE THIS THING! I got it during prime day sale and also got the Phillips hue lights to go with it. I use this every.single.day! 10/10 would recommend
I love our echo, it's so much better than the dot in regards to understanding what I"m saying (the Mic must be better). We use it daily!

reviews.reviewTitle: I miss the Volume Ring of Original version 1 Plus.
reviews.reviewText: I do like the improvement in sound greatly. I gave the Ver 2 Plus 5 Stars, and though it dosn't take away much from Ver 2 I still wish they would have kept the Volume Ring in the Design. Moto :).
Spooked off Echo when recordings were broadcast overseas. More attention to security and privacy will get my attention. Until then never mind.
I was very excited for this technology, unfortunately it is garbage. Even the daily routines malfunction ALL the time. DO NOT RELY ON THIS AS AN ALARM. Product needs major improvements.

reviews.reviewTitle: Helpful, smart and fun to use
reviews.reviewText: I am still learning all the various services the Echo Plus offers. Every day I learn something else she can do. Daily I listen 🎶 to music, ask for assistance with phone numbers, and use her to wake me when I have to be up at a certain time
I love that it has the smart home hub built in. I was able to get rid of both my Hue and SmartThings hubs and use just this. The sound quality is much better as well compared to the dot.

Given the limited functionality of the stereo sub pair, you only need to purchase one of these. Sound quality and voice recognition are good, but if you want a good multi device sound system buy something else.

The product is great, and, the stereo sound is great. The only thing I don't like about it you cannot stream certain stations (e.g. Spotify). I have linked it to my account, but to no avail it still won't let me stream it. All in all I love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great product you won’t be sorry if you get it
reviews.reviewText: This is great. Nice quality sound. You can add your Pandora & SiriusXM accounts for more listening pleasure. I recommend & would buy again
The sound is so much better than the original echo. Solid bass now. Great hub integration too. Highly recommend the new plus.

reviews.reviewTitle: will not work properly with "echo remote"
reviews.reviewText: will not work properly with "echo remote"

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa is like a lifelong friend that u can always talk to
reviews.reviewText: I've set this up along with the Dots all over my home to use as an intercom and whole home sound system. Expectedly, we do have some communication breakdowns but alexa and I manage through. She has also settled some trivial discussions (even some in my favor). She does control my lamps and began turning on/off my Christmas decorations. Prices are decent - get one (I got two - 1 with the hub built in- along with 4 dots)
The wife loves it to play her favorite music in the kitchen. Alexa answered a question one day that as not asked. Kinda weird. Is Alexa listening? Maybe I need to read the directions.

It is still new and I am getting used to how to phase questions. But this unit combined with things like smart bulbs and outlets is a game changer. It is so nice to walk into a room and just say "alexa, Turn on living room light" and have it go on. Still learning but greatly enjoying.

I love my echo plus. Currently I have it linked to my Nest thermostat and the light bulb that came with it. The speaker quality is nice. I listen music much more now. Trying to find more ways to use it. I find myself saying hey Alexa to my IPhone. LOL

It was smaller than I expected, so it looks nice and inconspicuous on my counter top. Love the sandstone color. Easy set up. Simple to Google ways on how to use it. Finding new tips and helpful stuff every day.

I have another echo plus and it works great, however this one has had issues since we bought it. I wanted to send it back once we hooked it up but it was for my wife's birthday and she wanted to keep it with hopes it would work somewhat. It never hears us, we will be playing music and it will take forever to answer and stop in the middle of playing the song .. out of nowhere. At this point its barely responsive and we've barely even used it.
I absolutely love my echo! I have found myself using it more than I thought I would. I am still learning everything I can do with it. Now to purchase other things to go with it

reviews.reviewTitle: I think I use mine wrong
reviews.reviewText: I just ask mine "where is chuck norris" and then tell it " My name is Ingo Montoya" pretty funny reply to both. Other than that I have it play music nothing more.

Omg, love the new echo plus 2nd generation..
The sound is fabulous....it actually sounds much better than the Bose....& The cost is so much cheaper.

Very nice upgrade to existing Echo. The sound difference is noticeable and a pleasant surprise. Got mine with plus and having the ability to turn lights off and on now is so nice. Happy with my purchase.

As of now, I am not sure if I can give Echo a greater star than 2 stars. I was excited to purchase it, but the only thing it seems to be good for is trivia questions and setting a timer. If you have suggestions for me, please let me know. I have Apple music and haven't been able to do anything with that.
Love love love this item alexa is wonderful the sound quality is great for size much mire than expected connection is great no issues crisp and clear

Revolutionary! Is the only way to describe this gem of a product. From artificial
Intelligence to humor,
This is the way to go...

Love the look of the Echo Plus. The sound is awesome on it compared to the echo dot. I don’t even have to pair it with my Bluetooth speaker the sound is that good. I could hardly hear the sound on the echo dot. It sounded so muffled and at volume 10 it was not high enough. You don’t have to worry about the plus. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t buy as a pair or with sub, Amazon’s app sucks.
reviews.reviewText: This product consistently struggles if you have a speaker pair with sub. Wasted hours setting it up and then doing it again and again as it broke down. Sonos one is infinitely simpler, much better app and quality sound.
I love the sound! I love the convenience! I love my speaker even more since I got Amazon music which is well worth the money! As soon as the price comes down on the Echo Plus I will buy a few more!

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa is handy but there is never a short answer
reviews.reviewText: I really like the sound quality and the functionality of the Alexa and this unit. My only complaint is Alexa talks too much...
The sounds and music play great! Asking Alexa to add to my shopping list is used daily and so helpful to see when I’m at the store.

reviews.reviewTitle: We love this personal assistant! What a deal!!!
reviews.reviewText: We love it! It’s so easy to listen to music, read an audible book, get the weather, make grocery lists and to do lists and more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for living room or bedroom
reviews.reviewText: Good sound. Already had Alexa devices so this setup was as easy as plugging in the device and found my WiFi automatically. Sound is better than the dot.

reviews.reviewTitle: I think she has to learn more?
reviews.reviewText:
I too am learning but I thought she would know more. Perhaps The more we use it the better she will get.
I get a lot of..."I don't know the answer to that..." It must be a learning process
We bought this Echo to play music. I have also programed it to tell me the weather and news in the morning. I love how many features it has, and really easy to use and set up!

I bought this for my daughter for Christmas with some of the accessories. She called me two weeks ago exclaiming that it was the best Christmas present ever. I guess it was a hit. The grandkids love asking Alexa off color questions.
This is my third Echo product! It is also my favorite, they just keep getting better and better. The sound quality is amazing! The look is sleek! Great size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Put it in a open area!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product! Have since gotten a echo spot and echo dot also for the other areas of the house. As long as it is in an open area it works great and she picks up everything I want her to do!

My life will never be the same now that I have an Alexa. It is the perfect addition for my office. I can play music in the background as well as getting my questions answered. The jokes are kinds cool too.
No more stumbling in the dark to turn the lights on. No more getting out of bed to turn the lights off. Alexa is a good helper. I haven't had any problems.
I love the concept of having immediate answers and I love music of all kinds at the tip of my fingers. I love starting my day knowing what the weather will be. And recipes... oh yes!!!

I was skeptical at first but I have to admit that it is very cool. We have definitely reached a high technology standard when you can speak all commands and it will be performed such as turning on off lights, appliances, add to my Google calendar and reminders that I would otherwise forget but just simply speaking my request. Any music I want is there. Welcome to the world of advanced technology.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn’t know as much as Google...
reviews.reviewText: Alexa is fun to talk to, enjoy music with and for weather info. However, many questions posed to it comes back with an I don’t know that. It needs Google.... I have yet been able to use the hub to turn the Phillips light on or off...

reviews.reviewTitle: Speaker sounds fabulous for music! Looking forward to adding more uses in the house.
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this Alexa in anticipation of the Alexa game called St. Noire by X2 games. I went with the plus because
it has better sound than the others. It actually sounds great, listen to music on it all the time and looking at other
Alexa enabled devices. It is the first smart speaker I’ve purchased, sounds great and will probably upgrade my Amazon music
as I’m listening to much more since it’s so easy. Sounds great!

Alexa is a good A.I. for your daily routine. I do have 2 issues with the hardware:
1) Whenever I travel to different countries, I have to manually set up the location and time zone. This process can be automated by parsing IP address and is simply annoying.
2) Why isn't a wireless edition of this speaker?

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Plus - The Goodness Just Gets Better and Better
reviews.reviewText: I have a few Echo products (Echo Dots, Echo, and now the Echo Plus). I'm impressed and really like the improvement in sound quality. All the Echo products are excellent and backed by the best smart assistant out there. I now need another Echo Plus for stereo pairing and the Echo subwoofer.

reviews.reviewTitle: If you want compact, this is for you
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to use, sits discreetly on the counter and the sound is great. I use it to listen to music and I sometimes ask it questions.

reviews.reviewTitle: Responde y suena muy bien, aunque muy limitado para el mercado estadounidense
reviews.reviewText: Lamentablemente, el Echo Plus es un magnífico aparato que tiene graves limitaciones funcionales en mercados diferentes al de los Estados Unidos. Muchas de las habilidades disponibles no funcionan sino en EE. UU.
Alexa has become such a natural extension of tech and a key tool in my life thank to this device. I love it and don’t know how I waited so long to make the purchase.
Our family loves the Echo. They're constantly asking for jokes or music. I love that I can create a playlist and ask Alexa to play such playlist. The reminder/notification feature is awesome too!!
I love Amazon Alexa devices! I won this one at work! Yay me! It has amazing sound quality and is easy to set up and use.
This is the best echo of the current echoes. The sound quality is deeper than the other echoes. Alexia’s seems more responsive than others in my opinion.
I have a small recording studio. I have decent ears for good sound sound I think. These speakers just sound great and fill a room. We now have three throughout the house and they are wonderful.
I upgraded my Dot to the Echo plus. I had enjoyed my dot but was looking for a better quality musical sound. The plus delivers very well. These things still amaze me.
At first I thought it would be a novelty item - like my Vector (which is adorable!). But after having it for a little bit, I find myself using Alexa all the time.
I love this home hub. I purchased another one right after, so that I can half on both floors of my house. It makes life so much easier.
Excellent sound quality! Response from Alexa is great, she even gives you extra information in addition to answering your question. Couldn't be happier.

reviews.reviewTitle: How easy this is to use and how helpful it can be in an emergency.
reviews.reviewText: This product is very useful to me as I fall a lot. All I have to do is tell Alexa to call my grandson and I don’t have to army crawl to get to a phone. I am 81 and live alone. I highly recommend this product for elderly people.
I use it mostly for music and weather information. I Have it connected to my speakers and it sounds great. Can't wait to buy lightbulbs that I can turn on and off with Alexa
This thing turned out to be a lot of fun, I have an echo dot, but you know moms she wanted to set up smart home...she loves it..must have

Love this ! I love this product so much, I actually bought four more dots for my household. We use it for everything from listening to music to helping the kids with homework. The speaker is incredible.

I'd marry Alexa if I could...and if my wife would let me. I wasn't sold on IoT until Amazon sent me a free echo dot with something I bought. Took a chance and never looked back. She controls the house. I feel like the Jetsons.
Needs Alexa to work. Which I don’t have or want. I was hoping I could use it for a speaker but can’t connect it without Alexa
Excellent sound for the entire house. Easy to use and intuitive. Looks good and easy to setup. Easy to integrate with other smart devices
Alexa was the hit of the household all day Christmas day answering questions. Some answers were perfect and some hilarious.

I recently upgraded to 2 of these paired up with the subwoofer. The sound quality is amazing! I recently played music at a party at my home with this setup and everyone complimented me on how rich the music sounded through these! I just ordered another set for the other level in my home...
Everything easy and as expected...btw, you can change her to wake to "Computer" which is Awesome!!!! Sound is better than bose speaker, she never doesn't hear me, it's great!
Once I got it going I really love it. Did not want to join my network but finally found the problem and now working like it should. Now I can start to experiment with all the things that go with it.

Set up and running very easily. This is my second one. First one was the dot version. I don't know how to make the two mesh up. If I set a timer on one, I can't get the other one to turn the notification off. I have to walk back to the room I set the timer in
It doesn't just listen to my voice but everyone's. It wouldn't set up at first either. & it can't understand you correctly half the time

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound so far, & very convenient.
reviews.reviewText: First Alexa product I have purchased and so far so good. Only thing I’m chasing trouble with is the fact I get a yellowish green ring glowing on the unit that usually turns blue when you call for Alexa.

I upgraded from an Echo Plus 1st Edition. I really wasn't going to because the original Echo Plus worked great. Boy am I glad I did. If you listen to much music, the sound quality is a tremendous improvement. In addition, Alexa seems to understands or hears me better.

If you are on the fence about buying or upgrading, don't be. The Echo Plus 2nd Edition is a great purchase.

The Echo Plus is a great little smart speaker, it works well with other echo devices, the Zigbee hub means you don't have to worry about which smart plugs/bulbs you use as it works with just about all of the major brands. Alexa itself is like all voice-activated 'smart' systems, you learn its limitations and try to convince your wife that this is what was missing from your lives all along.

OMG! I love, love my Echo Plus! Set up took about 5 minutes. Really easy. Putting in the compatible light bulbs took longer than the set up. The Echo Plus does so much, everything from turning lights on and off; plays Amazon music; latest news local and national; weather; stock reports; alarms; timer; games; jokes; and imitations. Notifies you of messages or updates and much much more! I highly recommend this product !
Dont waste your money. The app makes this product ridiculously hard to use/set up correctly. Get Google Assistant instead.
So happy I up-graded. The music sound is wonderful. Great integration with lights and door lock. Makes life easier and safer.

reviews.reviewTitle: I could take it or leave it
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, there's really nothing spectacular about it. She doesn't seem to understand very many of my questions. Once I had it play a specific radio station and then asked for the same station the next day, but played everything but that station. I definitely don't feel this device is worth the amount of money they are asking for it. Perhaps the devices with the displays would be though.
It’s better than the older version, the sound the response and the fact that it has a hub, but it would get 5 stars if it also had z way compatibility with out having to get a second hub.

We use ours primarily for music. The sound system in this thing doesn’t disappoint! We can hear the music clear as day from anywhere in the house. And telling Alexa to “Drop In” upstairs on our echo is amazing. No need to yell or install intercom. We are in love. The white one is what we have!
Better sound when listening at low setting when going to sleep. You don't have to raise your voice as much to get Alexa's attention.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product - wish sound was a bit fuller and wish it was easier to pair with phone
reviews.reviewText: Great overall sound quality for something so small, but I wish I could use it as a speaker for my phone - can't seem to pair that way.
Aside for all that Alexa can do the sound quality is exceptionally good. The reference speakers I use are a pair of Devialets.

I was amazed at the sound quality of the Echo Plus considering its size. It has thumping bass that you can feel on the table. It does so many things that I use once in a while, but I use it mainly to play music and for timers/reminders/alarm clock. I liked it so much I gave 2 of them as Christmas gifts.

Enjoying my new Alexa. I mostly use to listen to music, workstation timer (reminder to take computer breaks) and powering TV. Still having minor problems with certain commands but still a great buy for the intention of why I originally purchased.

reviews.reviewTitle: Why didn't I buy this sooner?
reviews.reviewText:
This thing is great! First day I got it... I spent hours see'n what she can do. I love the Flash Briefing.
I use it to control my kids Philips Hue light. Also just bought the Dot for Kids so I can "drop in" and talk to him... and so he will leave min a lone.
Great way to add wireless intercom to your home.

Sounds really good for a speaker of its size. I was using a jbl clip speaker with a dot and this has better sound and eliminates a couple cords. The Heather gray is also very stylish. More expensive than the other echos but when you compare it to a bose or jbl bluetooth speaker price or get it on a sale it is reasonable.

I love my Echos! It’s so nice being able to change lighting, listen to the morning news, music, and much more. Alexa responds exactly as she should 99% of the time and I have one in almost every room. Couldn’t be happier.
Like the more compact design. Good sound. Fairly easy to set up.

The Echo Plus is in the middle of a large room and Alexa does not have any issues hearing voice commands. I purchased this to go along with my Harmony remote and it's great to be able to use voice commands for my television. I've also purchased several plugs and can control my lamps with voice control or using the app.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great and better if you have more echos.
reviews.reviewText: Worked well. Definitely worth getting the stereo pair. Can pair the stereo pair with multi room speakers for ultimate winning. Basically have an echo in every room now.

It will take a while to understand the value of this product, but so far I have been able to set up morning routines to mage lighting and morning reports. The functions I have set up work very well, but it's just the tip of the iceberg. Amazon sends you a lot of good tips, and necessity drives the usability. I will report back when I have used the device for 3 months.
Great for remote operations and asking for information. Have used it for some music, but several requests create costs so be careful you don’t commit to monthly fees!!
I love Alexa! It is such a wonderful product that works with other smart devices. I would highly recommend this product.
Not much better than series 1 which it replaces. Sound doesn't seem better. I am constantly repeating myself to get Alexa to respond

reviews.reviewTitle: Not much improvment over first Echo
reviews.reviewText:
I thought this new Echo would here my voice better.
It did not.
Bass and treble is only a small improvment.
Mostly says I don't know that one. She will give you weather report even if it's wrong. Must get it of the internet

Simple commands that I used on original Alexa seem to confuse or get me totally different results with this second gen plus. I don’t know if it is the device on or Alexa. Sound is better the previous, but not much.

Still the best smart device out there though!
Its a lot of fun. I have to admit. Its not perfect but i find it worth it with the unlimited music from amazon. If i did not have the unlimited music it works also with pandora.

reviews.reviewTitle: Greater flexibility than first generation Echo.
reviews.reviewText: It fit right in controlling my Sonos smart speakers, after my first generation Echo failed. Have not hooked up smart bulbs yet.
Someday, people will wonder what they did before 'smart' devices. Yes, we were just fine in the '90's without smart phones but now we use them 100 times a day.

Definitely an upgrade from the previous model. Sound is better. Bass is a little deeper. still no groundbreaking sound like Sonos but well worth the price for a bedroom speaker. Add a second one and you’re all set. More responsive and better at hearing you call Alexa up.
Echo devices are my favorite. Beautiful sound. I also have a google home mini but the echo sound is so much better

Love this little thing. Fun to interact with and a great tool for controlling certain elements, like a plug and light bulb. Not the greatest sound, not even close to quality of my Bose Soundlink but then, hey it was half the price.
Sound quality is so much better than the original Echo we bought. This works great and getting it set up was very easy.
Sound much better than Gen 1. Need one more though to get good stereo sound. Or a good bluetooth speaker. Should sell a combo of some sort to address that. No issues in performance.
very easy set up, wife won't leave her alone, lol. sound quality is very good from such a small package. may buy a 2nd one for down stairs

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous buying this product I have an Echo Dot. I was afraid it was not going to have the sound that I require. I was wrong. This unit is everything I was looking
It hears me a lot less than the last model, I’ll be right next to it and it doesn’t respond. When it hears me it works ok, a lot of stuff doesn’t work like routines

reviews.reviewTitle: My first ever echo plus and loving it
reviews.reviewText: Love the rich sound quality, I haven't used the line out function yet, but I'm using the line in connected to a desktop sound card. If the subwoofer goes on sale for a really good price I will add that also.
We are enjoying our Echo Plus! So nice to tell someone else to turn off or on the lights. Also so easy to ask a question and get an immediate answer!

reviews.reviewTitle: The Echo Plus looks great, perfect size and awesome sound.
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Plus looks great, perfect size and awesome sound. We upgraded a dot and the upgrade was worth every penny.
The sound is amazing. I can turn a lamp on in my house from wherever I am using my phone, I love this device. I used to have an echo dot and I am so glad that I upgraded.

bit difficult to set up but works well when done
Alexa can answer a fair amount of enquires but not everything
useful for reminders, timer and calendar events

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and microphones are sensitive to Alexa commands
reviews.reviewText: I usually use this for music or to control my fire tv. It is simple to set up and use, and it picks u on one’s voice so easily you don’t have to yell

reviews.reviewTitle: We enjoy, and visitors do so as well, very handy
reviews.reviewText: Nice sound compared to first gen, easy set up, Alexa has gotten much better over time with q&a’s. Control of lights and ambient music/sound when we want is awesome.
Pretty decent sound. Better sounding than the dot. Built in hub is nice. Using it to control some Phillips Hue bulbs. Works great. No glitches.

This is the second echo I've purchased and the original older echo was way better. This new echo plus drops my internet connection every day, sometimes 2 or 3 times a day. I even bought a upgraded modem/router that is stronger with no appreciable results, still drops signal all the time
Sound quality not as expected, and no way to totally mute. Still receiving notifications. feels sturdy setup was easy and integration as well

The voice recognition is horrible and not intuitive and it does not flow from one sentence to another.

Amazon keeps pushing their music services for additional cost which is a annoying.

Amazon music is very limited specially for kids. Also the radio channels are not suitable for kids. For example some hippies paying Humpty Dumpty with guitar and mellow voice is not kids music.

I'm new to the smart home trend but I can say the Echo Plus 2nd gen device has made my transition seamless and easy. From plugs to canned lights and smart light switches controlling lights, I couldn't be more pleased. I haven't used Alexa to her full capabilities and haven't even listened to music yet so I can't comment on the sound quality. But for smart home needs, this thing is as advertised.
I love the size and sound, just have to play with it much more to see all that is can do. I have the Eco tower and the new one and several dots.
went from the echo dot to this. Sound is great, more convenient than a bluetooth speaker or aux cable. Fills a room for sure. Made me contemplate an amazon music subscription.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Plus is my New Found Friend!
reviews.reviewText: I love my echo plus - It wakes me up every morning. Listen to music, get daily weather, local news ask general questions
Purchase two along with the sub. Love the good quality sound for streaming music. Easy to connect and use. Still trying to figure out all the things that Alexa can do. So far extremely satisfied! :-)
I use this in my office. It makes it easy for me to change radio stations without physically having to change stations on the radio. It gives me more options including playing Amazon music.

I ordered 2 echo plus speakers, and one subwoofer. After downloading the Alexa app, I could not pair all three speakers together. only 1 echo plus speaker works. I went on U-tube to get some help and a guy on there had the same problem. Please help.
Bought this as a gift for someone with a medical problem that is home alone often. It is a safety backup so they could call for help, if needed. But the whole family loves it.
Tweaked the equilizer a bit for my taste. Sounds and music is amazing on this device. However, the bass becomes none existant at volume 70% and above
I wasn't sure if I would like this, but I must admit I enjoy listening to music on this. Alexa works fairly well, but occasionally there are mistakes made. Overall, a great product.

I also have a 2nd generation echo (not the echo plus) and I would like to say the sound is much better. The lows seem to to go down deeper and are tighter. The midrange and highs are cleaner and much easier to listen to. One feature I love is the temperature reading. I can check the temperature of my house when I am away. I have not used the smart hub features yet, but plan to soon. Good product.

reviews.reviewTitle: replaced my entire stereo system with this little guy
reviews.reviewText: it sounds good enough that i'm ok with only having 1 for now. in the amazon book store i listened to it with 2 connected and a sub, and it sounded way better, but this is fine for now. sounds great for the money. SOOO much better than the regular echo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Didn't know what I was missing until now.
reviews.reviewText: I love having Alexa. I have her set up to be able to control my TVs. I love that just with my voice I can turn on music and switch any of it. My toddlers loved it too they get her to turn on toddler music and dance like crazy. Sound is amazing.
I love this device it makes smart home living easy and the speaker for music is quite good as well, overall I'm very happy with this item.
LOVE!!! I am older and alone most days. Alexa is there if I fall, there to remind me of lists etc., Or there for information on anything. She will also make me smile!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good producet and well made with couple of flaws
reviews.reviewText: The sound is wonderful and the system is very responsive. However, I can not connect the two speakers and sub set to my old gen echo show. Also sometimes the Echo has trouble understanding what I am saying possibly due to my New York accent.

Decided to give technology a try. Glad I did. Smart home in the making. I’ve connect to two light fixtures and I purchased an echo dot for my daughters room. Love the drop in feature. Music everywhere. I just wish the bulbs and plug in adapter were not so expensive. We have a big house. Planning on the doorbell next.

I placed this on our covered porch. I know it is not "outside" rated but I did it anyway. The sound is great. Much better than the Version 1 Echo. I use it for music outside while working in the garden and to voice control the lights and fans on the porch. Love it!

Sometimes I have to tell her several times to do something before she does. She’s stubborn like that. But she’s great and I love her anyway.

I leave her on during the day to play music from pandora for my birds while I’m at work. They seem to enjoy it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Anniversary gift for husband that he loves
reviews.reviewText: I gave this to my husband for our anniversary. He already has everything. He loves this and uses it daily. Easy set up.
Alexa is fun...asking her things, making lists, turning things on and off. And the speaker is great for music!

Received this as a gift for Christmas... what an incredible device! I use Alexa for all kinds of tasks around the house. Also received some smart bulbs and plug in devices to control with my voice. Super convenient!

Having the Echo Plus has really made each day a lot more fun. Play any song you want, of course with my amazon music subscription, hear news and weather reports with a simple voice command, and ask a million questions and getting answers in seconds. It is definitely a tool that makes life easier and more fun.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't Think Twice, Just Get It
reviews.reviewText:
I can't believe how much I use this device! Easy setup, easy to get used to. Adding skills is also very easy. Makes my life easier in many ways. Music, news, weather, calendar, TV remote control, lights, fan, door locks, etc......
Very cool!
Cumbersome set up. Marginally useful applications as well as the potential for third parties to list into my home activities made it an unwanted product.

Great for my wife who is bed-bound she can turn on music/lights and communicate from her bed with out any other devices. Good for her safety if something was to happen to me she can call for help without worrying batteries being charged.

reviews.reviewTitle: No issues and easy to install. Love how they work
reviews.reviewText: Had waited several months to get them set up and using them. My wife and I love how they work and what you can do with them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound Quality is awful and sub connection has a ton of issues
reviews.reviewText:
Sound is very tinny metallic sounding
bought the echo sub nothing but issues (sound only going to sub and not echo plus) group adding
Alexa doesn't seem to understand my southern accent. The speaker is of really poor quality. I'll just stick to using my apps for Sonos and asking Siri questions.

Only had the new Echo Plus for a few hours, but the sound quality is VASTLY improved.

I will update this after I've used more features.
This is just perfect. I have both google and Alexa and both are great, but I rather use My Echo Plus yo control everything in my house.
I had a Google device (was given as a present) and this is SO much better - am still exploring all the things it can do, but love it.
We bought this for a great price from the Amazon Treasurer Truck, this has better sound than I would have thought! We are very happy buyers, plus came with a smart light as a bonus.

I have not used it yet I am going to use it to automate my basement where I will be living when I get it done but I did get it out and played with it asking her some question works great love it then I put it back in the box for when I am ready : )))

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound, only links stereo with another plus
reviews.reviewText: Sound is improved and has equalizer control, smaller size and covering looks better. Too bad it cannot be linked with other echo products for stereo sound affect.

reviews.reviewTitle: Just ask Alexa what ever you want to know.
reviews.reviewText: I love my Echo Alexa. I can find answers to questions without having to stop & peck it out to get an answer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa helps me stay on time
reviews.reviewText: The sound is very clear. Love the jokes, some are corny but funny. Alexa is great at remembering my appointments and reminders. Also great as a alarm clock. I also set up the light and outlet with Alexa easy setup and works great.

I had the dot before but broke it when I put a salt lamp too close to it. (Don’t put salt lamps near any electronics)

The bass is amazing and the sound is so much richer than my previous dot. I only use it for music, but I’m super impressed with it

We first bought our Echo Plus to be able to have some of the conveniences it provides. We were pleasantly surprised to see how easy it is to work the technology on our lights and other accessories in our home. Alexa is very convenient from writing and printing our grocery list to the weather report to any music we want to listen to. And there is so much more, but the list would be endless.

reviews.reviewTitle: Much improved over the echo 2nd gen
reviews.reviewText: Much improved over the echo 2nd gen. Sound quality is good and robust for the size. Voice recognition seem to be improved also. Built in home hub works well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa is a handy little assistant!
reviews.reviewText: I love using Alexa to play music all day everyday but when I need some calming I ask her to play thunderstorms, ocean sounds or rainforest sounds. She’s great for setting alarms, sleep timers and putting things on to do lists. I like to ask her for the weather, movie times and fun stuff! Wasn’t sure I’d get much use from her but she’s turned out to be a real treat!
Sound quality is great, voice recognition not always accurate. Durable and it’s a good gift item for the hussy. He loves to use it especially when watching movies.
What a great device - it is easily worth the money just for playing music with such incredible sound quality. All the other capabilities are gravy.
The sound is great on this Echo. I play music all the time and love it. I had to send one back because it stopped working after a couple of days, but I received the new one right away.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent, just not what I expected!
reviews.reviewText: So this is 100% an upgrade from the 1st generation echo I had! However the smart hub capabilities are not as great as I’d hoped they would have been. My smart hub (Logitech) stopped working and I was looking to replace it. But, overall I’m very happy with this and glad I got it on prime day!
This is amazing there are so many options on this Echo Plus. The sound is amazing great addition to any home
This thing works great with the Hubitat Elevation hub. Plz to link it up to Alexa using the Hubitat / Alexa app. Five stars. - jwrit Boulder Co

reviews.reviewTitle: Way better than the 1st Gen Echo.
reviews.reviewText:
I've had it for about a month now. It worka well, have not had a problem yet.
I love how I don't need a Philips Hue hub anymore to control all my lights, like I used to need when I had the 1st Gen Echo. My lights are now much more responsive. I also used to have hub connection issues often before, and I no longer do.
It also sounds way better than the 1st Gen.
The sound is better than my original Echo. I doesn’t need a holder to keep it from tipping over. I use my play music everyday everywhere from SiriusXM turbo to Pandora & Amazon just ask...

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy setup better value than next model down
reviews.reviewText: Eeasy to use and set up. Got. It as a gift for someone who isn’t great with technology. She set. It up very easy and fast. Worth the extra money to have the hub installed inside Alexa. Makes it easier for the future if you ever decide to get any smart appliances or lightbulbs
This has an amazing sound and easy to use - a little difficult to connect to internet on initial set up
I use this device for listening to overseas radio stations. It works very well fo this purpose. However, the remote I bought with the Echo Plus does not work. It is completely dead.
I’m sure at some point the technology will be there but it’s not quite there yet. I couldn’t set up something as simple as an alarm from one of my playlists

Love the way it integrated easily. Still figuring out how to make the echo Dot 2 work with the echo plus. But as I accumulate add ins I am sure it will be easier to have a smart house and I love the fact that she is hooked into my amazon account for quick add ins to shopping and to do lists

reviews.reviewTitle: If you got smart devices it’s great otherwise it’s actually pointless.
reviews.reviewText: Alexa is great if you have kids, if you don’t it’s basically useless unless you have any other smart devices in your home, overall for the product is great in terms of how it functions and what it can do.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Addition to Our New Home!
reviews.reviewText: Still earning how and what this all will do, but extremely satisfied to what we know at this point. Great addition as well when you sync up with your iPhone for calendar and contacts.
Wanted a little more then just the Dot due to speakers for music. Works fine so far, haven’t had very long.

reviews.reviewTitle: Speaker works very well and has good understanding of wjat i ask it
reviews.reviewText: Sound is very good with this one but i got a echo show and migjt only needed a dot as a hub. Thing works and hooks up easily.

It's so neat the music it plays and the sound is awesome
It's easy to set up
Just another great product from AMAZON
The new Echo Plus is awesome! The speaker sounds rich and clear. The new microphone can hear a pin drop.
Good sound and everything. The speaker is pretty heavy. Sometimes Alexa is slow to respond though and the speaker occasionally freezes for a minute.

Pairs for a short period of time and won't re-pair... I had to delete the pairing group and re-pair numerous times. Support called me and sent me material for when the Echo drops wi-fi... Not the issue. The pairing is the issue and seems that you have to strictly use the "Default Services" in the music settings to utilize the pairing of speakers/sub.
Echo Plus is a great device to keep in the household. It's got premium sound and built-in home hub to complement the smart devices in my home already.
love the hub in the speaker just wish the sound quality was a little better but its not too bad easy to set up as well

I'm a believer that Voice will be a huge part of where we're headed, so I made a calculated step and decided to go w/ Alexa. So far I'm loving the Echo Plus as an entry point to this universe, and specifically I'm pleased that Alexa now has access to Apple Music. I haven't enabled a ton of skills as of yet, but looking forward to growing my "skill set" in the coming months and years. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewTitle: It does more than you think it can
reviews.reviewText: I'm still learning all the things that Alexa can do for me. So many helpful and entertaining tools in one gadget.

The echo plus speaker is the best of the chain. It has great sound. In fact, I bought another one to get even better sound. Now that Apple Music is available. The three major music services are available.
I have a pair of Echo+ on my desk and when paired and set to stereo, they are producing the best stereo sound I ever heard and I have high end audio equipment.
I love to have background music playing, and this device is perfect. Clear, nice rich sound. Not "boomy" or "tinny -- very pleasant to listen to.
I have the older generation and this is a definite step up in sound quality. Pairing between the two for multi-room music was challenging to set up, but worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: For Some Reason it keeps disconnecting
reviews.reviewText: Not sure why, but this is the only echo in our house that keeps disconnecting. All of the others maintain their connection well. Kind of annoying, considering this is the best looking one we own.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love having Alexa in the house.
reviews.reviewText: I love asking her questions and hearing her responses. Nice way to say good morning. And, the quality of the sound is excellent.
I had difficulty with set up at first as I downloaded the wrong app. Once I got the right one, set up was easy. Using mostly for music and weather.
Only thing I would do different is spring for the ZigBee enabled accessories up front. Bit of learning experience for me.
I love this. It Is my first Alexa device and sounds great. It even has decent bass and big sound for a small package. It definitely sounds better than my friend’s older echo. I am a fan!
It is fabulous. I love being able to have so much music available to me with just an "Alexa" request.
I use my Echo+ every day. I ask Alexa all sorts of questions that i would normally do an internet search on. All good!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 2nd generation includes the hub you would normally need to set up other devices.
reviews.reviewText: Alexa can’t do everything however she makes a great assistant and having her connect to compatible devices is usually fairly easy. Easy start to set up for a smart home if you want.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't connect bluetooth to allow apps such as YouTube to play
reviews.reviewText: I have two Speakers paired with sub, kept dropping out between the three speakers. Asked for volume down and no noticable difference.
Sound is very good on this device...it's no Bose but for the price it's good. And with the built in hub no brainier.
I love my new Echo Plus. The fact that stuff work because of the build in hub is amazin. The only reason this is getting a four out five is because I don't know how to clean it.
Great sounding speaker with compact size. Music is reasonably clear and bass is noticeable. Definitely a good purchase.
Alexa cant hear me sometimes and i feel myself yelling and sometime screaming while the music is on.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Plus and Alexa work as expected.
reviews.reviewText: We like the ability to set multiple times — oven, grill, stove, etc — Verbally. We also like being able to request albums and/or songs thru Lexa, and the sound quality is surprisingly good. A 2nd Echo Plus will allow us to play Prime Music through our soundbar. We have not tried the included smart bulbs yet.
Love that this Alexa has the hub built in so I don't have to worry about that when looking for products to pair with her.
The sound from this device is so much richer than from my echo dot. I like the exterior appearance. I bought it on Prime Day and saved a lot. I would not have paid the full price for it though.

3 stars only because my echo plus will randomly drop my Apple Music account. When this happens, I have to re-link my Apple Music account which takes a solid amount of time. The only reason I bough this product is because of the promise that Apple Music would work with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa blends in with any room decor. Its almost invisible.
reviews.reviewText: We are discovering new ways to use Alexa every day. Alexa helps with homework, answers questions, maintains the family grocery list, plays any music we ask for, Notifies us when an Amazon package has been left at our front door, times the cooking. I just need to figure out how to have Alexa clean the house, feed the cat and take out the trash. The only regret is that we didn't buy Alexa sooner.
I really like my Echo a lot I like listening to music which I do much more now ..I even let it for my furry girl when I have to leave her alone.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's not without it's problems. So far good customer swevice.
reviews.reviewText: At times it shuts off. Sometimes have to have Alexa keep going back to program. When it works, it's wonderful! Thought they would have the glitches worked out by now!
Still discovering device capabilities. It finds more devices than Echo 2nd. gen. and setup seems easier. What a pleasant surprise. Very pleased!
Sounds great, and gets used everyday. Great for a news brief in the morning and jokes at night. Plus I think Alexa can kick Siri’s ass.

I like the device. It produces good sound, understands the voice comments and gives good search information. For the first time user, it may take for a while to figure out how to set up and sync to other Bluetooth or wireless devices.

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than the echo dot, yes!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for the better sound, Its better just not sure the price difference matches the sound difference. Again I just bought this for the improved sound over the dot
The sound quality is terrible when I pair my iPhone to it. It’s just terrible. Muddled and weak.

Works very well and sound is realistic and very good. We are just starting to learn all the things that can be done with this device. My wife loves it since she doesn’t have a smart phone and now she has the convenience of voice control.
Purchased as a birthday gift for my daughter, she loves it, got her a dot for each child's room, no more yelling dinner is ready

I have had this for a while now, It is a very cool device. It has great sound quality but since it didn't do well with bass, I got the Alexa subwoofer which was worth it. Worth every penny!

Btw get Amazon Music, its worth it!
We have many echo devices and use a few with speakers for music. This was the perfect solution in the kitchen. Looks great, sounds great, and will likely get another.
Was easy for her to set up because dear old dad was there to help (I have owned one for several months). Her and the grand kids plated with it all day.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun, Useful and it Sounds Great!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t believe it took me this long to get this. It’s fun and useful and the sound is really good. I’m amazed at how far away you can be and still talk to Alexa. After getting this I got 2 Dots and 2 sets of 2 smart bulbs for the family room and master bedroom.
The sound on this thing is incredible. I thought the Gen 1 Echo sounded great until I heard this one. Built in Zigbee Hub is a plus.
I love the new Echo. It's great. I have it for weather, music mostly and the sound is incredible. I have two of last year's model. Love all.
I don’t like the fact I can’t link up any my other echo products to create a mesh speaker group

reviews.reviewTitle: RECONOCER ALGUNAS CANCIONES QUE AL PARECER NO ESTAN REGISTRADAS
reviews.reviewText:
QUE TENGAN MAS CANCIONES EN CASTELLANO, POR EJEMPLO PONGO CANCIONES DE ENRIQUE GUZMAN, ME CONTESTE QUE NO LO RECONOCE, PERO LE POGO CANCIONES DE LOS TEEN TOPS SI RECONOCE LAS CANCIONES DONDE CANTA ENRIQUE GUZMAN.
CANCIONES EN INGLES TAMPOCO NO RECONOCE ALGUNAS; POR EJEMPLO PIDO CANCIONES COMO: "IT`S TOO LATE" NO LAS RECONOCE; CANCIONES COMO "VENUS"; "DEAMON LOVER" NO LAS RECONOCE SON SCHOCKING BLUE
Great product that works as described. The amazon Echo app could use some work to make it more user friendly but, the more I use the product, the more impressed I become.

For a while i thought Alexa didn't work since she didn't respond, but figured out I was saying Alexis instead of Alexa, which she knows the difference. Sometimes she has trouble with radio stations, but I just need to be clear in what I ask for...
Love this. Wish l got it a long time ago. Awesome uses, and l can jam when l cook, answer my phone, ask questions.
The sound is good. I dislike that it will only connect to the same type of alexas. I have all the older ones, and was hoping they would all connect together.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can’t make home theater with echo pluses
reviews.reviewText: Was really hopping to make a home theater system/sound system with fire tv cube and 2 echo pluses and echo sub but walked away with disjointed audio and no home theater sound... disappointed...

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Plus vs Google Home Hub
reviews.reviewText: I love the echo plus. I purchased it to replace our google home hub. Between the two platforms I find the echo plus much easier to connect to the various applications in order to operate all of our Bluetooth enabled electronics. My husband says that she “gets” him much better than the google home hub which he was constantly frustrated with.

Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it doesn't have a docking station so it has to remain plugged into the wall at all times. I would love to be able to move it from room to room without unplugging it and the previous model does have a docking station so hopefully they'll come out with one for the new Echo soon! The quality of sound is wonderful!
This has improved sound playback. I am debating if the mic array is improved or not. It seems as sensitive as the original then once in a while it get confused if the TV is on.
This is my first Alexa device and it has been great both as a personal assistant and for playing music with voice commands.
Great listening for casual music. Amazon Prime has many tunes and it easily supports Pandora, Spotify and others. So glad we got this with the Echo Spot. Having both is lots of fun!

reviews.reviewTitle: Download the blue app with 3/4 moon on it
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an Alexa for no particular reason, don’t know how to use it completely but I do like it! And my Grandson likes to play games.

reviews.reviewTitle: for older generations it helps them stay connected and aware
reviews.reviewText: I love that I know the weather outside before I have to go out in it. I can set up appointments and at my age I forget things very easily so its wonderful among so many other functions I love including music

My expectation was low with the ability to connect with my current devices but it didn’t even meet those. I’ll have to add more compliant devices to justify this purchase. Not doing my homework prior to purchase is on me.

I’m very satisfied with my echo plus and the grey looks exactly like it does on line in the picture. Im old school and wasn’t sure if I would like it but wow !! I love it !! I definitely recommend this product to all know matter your age !!!

I'm very happy with the audio quality. It's much better than the Echo Plus (1st gen) that this is replacing. The microphone also seems to be better at recognizing my voice when there is a lot of background noise.

I'm not using the integrated Zigbee smart hub, so no comments on it.

The bluetooth speaker that isn't a bluetooth speaker. Takes almost all versatility from speaker
Edit. It appears that Amazon fixed this issue with android.
So far, this works great. Good sound, although I am looking at getting the subwoofer to have a little more bass. BUT...i have learned to pair it with my soundbar and may really not need it after all.
I wasn't sure about this unit, but some friends have one and it sounded like it was easy to use and set up so we ordered one! We LOVE ALEXA for sure!!
Absolutely the best purchase we have made in a while! The ability to voice control our living room light is a lifesaver when you have 3 kids and full hands!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is absolutely a wonderful toy! Alexa is amazing
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to set up, with the help of Amazon rep Ryan. Great value, sound quality excellent.
I have a gen 1 echo and this new version blows it away for sound. I'd like to add a second and the subwoofer.
So far, we are very pleased with Alexa and as we learn how to utilize it further I think we will enjoy it even further.
Love it. It was my first Echo and we’ve already ordered a second one (a Dot) for another part of the house.
Love the redesign on this Echo Plus and much better sound quality. Too bad Alexa can't write all of these reviews for me 😁
I love this little speaker. It sounds pretty good and works amazingly as a smart speaker. I love it
I love it ,i had jbl google voice never liked it failed always ,but ALEXA IS PERFECT I LOVE IT I HAVE 2 IN THE HOUSE AND THERE GREAT SYNC TOGETHER AND SEE WHAT HAPPENS IT'S AWSOME

reviews.reviewTitle: Why did I take so long
reviews.reviewText: This is my opinion is a MUST have , if you like music , information or any other bit of entertainment...Handfree and simple to use ..always thinking about what else I can to with Alexa
Very happy with this new updated version, much better sound...don’t really have a use for the hub as I already have hubs for my Hue lights and WeMo devices
I should have purchased Google Home. Wish I could exchange it but I am past return period.
I absolutely love my Echo Plus. I talk to Alexa all the time! I also purchased the plugs for my lights and Dots to add to other rooms! One of the best purchases I have made. Love love love!

Being a first time user of an Amazon Echo, I found it very easy to set up to a home network, I even went ahead and bought some smart outlets to control various items, with more outlets on the way. Even the Amazon App. is easy. to navigate and set up.
We very much enjoy our Echo. Had it plugged in since Christmas and it's been the best electronic to happen to our home! Even our toddlers scream, "Awesa! Awesa!" :)

I like this little convenient device. Sound is good for a non-closure area however I have an opened concept between family room and kitchen, the sound has echoed sometimes. Overall it’s still a nice device. One thing I know, it makes me lazier...

reviews.reviewTitle: It attached very easily to all of my other devices!
reviews.reviewText: So far I am pleased with the purchase and the ability for this to connect to other devices.

reviews.reviewTitle: READ ALL ABOUT IT : Alexa replaces need for Husband
reviews.reviewText: It’s me and Alexa - who needs a man when you can have her do it all - order from Amazon to turn off the lights to change the Temp. Dump your man and get this!

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun to use but need more steps to understand how to use.
reviews.reviewText: Seems very clear and accurate so far. Only had it a week. Not sure how to program. Need better directions.
Great tool! Relatively easy to get up and running. Had some issues with email and calendar. It’s easier if you only have one email and one calendar. It is super for listening to music.

Like the music and outside weather as well as inside temperature monitoring features as well as being able to control certain supported household items such as lights. Still feel that Alexa is not quite up to tougher internet inquiries. Seem to get many, “I’m not sure” answers.... Hope she gets smarter in the future...

Great sound. Easy to set-up and to use. This item is a winner. NO complaints.
Get one!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great start to my smart home
reviews.reviewText: I love techy gadgets. My husband, not so much. He changed his mind when he got to tell alexa what songs he wanted to hear. He said she minds him better than I do.... and doesn't give him the same sign language I do

reviews.reviewTitle: Great that we can pair them together.
reviews.reviewText: After some troubleshooting, it turns out that one of my Echo Plus devices had a connection issue and was cutting out. I was contacted immediately about the issue and a replacement will arrive two days from now. Looking forward to enjoying the setup when the replacement arrives. I can tell already that this is a big upgrade from the previous version.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ripoff you have to buy the music you like!!
reviews.reviewText: Everything is disappointing. I would never recommend it, first off you have to pay for the music you like, that wasn't disclosed and tbat is pathetic and sad. So I don't use it it was a waste of money and I was ripped off, don't buy this con.
Well she doesn't know everything but she knows a lot. Very helpful for reminders, music and questions.
The speaker has a much better sound than the echo DOT (Don't tell the 4 dots in the house). I with I could afford to have speakers in every room!

reviews.reviewTitle: I love that it is nice and compact and includes the hub.
reviews.reviewText: I've had problems trying to use all my smart devices with prior Echo devices, but this one was a breeze to setup and get all my devices connected to it. I may just buy another one so I can have stereo sound.
I’ve been enjoying the echo plus. The sound is great and Alexa responds pretty well. It is easy to setup and it has a lot of alternatives to use.
I'm turning my home into a smart home and this along with some dots got, me off to a perfect start.
It works about like the old echo, but no instructions on how to do away with my smart hub and if I knew it wouldn't do that I wouldn't have purchased it.
We love this Alexa. We were looking for stereo for an RV and decided to give Alexa a try and we are not disappointed comes in handy for so many things.

reviews.reviewTitle: More than Happy with this product!
reviews.reviewText: This product excceded my expectations. I have never had an Alexia product and while visiting a friend for thanks giving he had two of them in his house and they worked great. I purchased this one and I use it every day. We love it.
I purchased the new Gen2 Echo Plus because of the smart hub, but I also like that it has even better sound than my original Echo, as well as an audio input port.
Great sound, ease of operation, but less than desirable manual or instructions for total operation and use.
Love the sound quality! And voice recognition is way better than the dot. I love it, so far!
Works like my other Echo, but has the hub to control my smart-home devices. I had no trouble installing and syncing lights and outlets to control.
Alexa doesn’t know very much, I have to stand right next to it for it to recognize your voice! Devices don’t work together !
It was easy to set up and connect to our Pandora Music already in place and the sound is great. Still working on other features we thought it would be useful for.
Alexa can hear me from most rooms and responds. New commands are emailed each week. Very convenient and helpful.

reviews.reviewTitle: The best gift we didn’t know we needed!
reviews.reviewText: Love everything we can do without ever touching a phone! Definitely helpful for a mom of two with a husband that is active duty. We received Alexa as a Christmas gift and had no idea how much we would enjoy her. She plays our music, answers questions, tells us the weather, updates us on the news, tells us when our packages are arriving and even makes my grocery list!
Best Amazon has done. Controls all huge equipment faster than their own hub. Great work...
I bought this Echo as a Valentines gift for my husband. We love it and use it quite frequently, mostly for music. Honestly, everybody should have one!
I can control all my lights , alexa tv just with my voice and the sound has improve a lot.
Sound quality phenomenal. I havent used all the features yet, but bug on sound quality. Love the alarm and looking forward tonusing other features
I love this new echo. I use it everyday for all kinds of great stuff. I synced it with four other echo dots throughout my house.

Echo Plus (2nd Gen) - Premium sound with built-in smart home hub - Charcoal:
No complaints, Five Stars.
I like the improved sound quality over the Echo 2nd Gen. It fully understands what I am saying even from a far distant & side area. Music sound is magnificent.
I am a huge fan on the Alexa’s, having installed 5 at home. I can say that even though the sound is a little bit better than the previous generation, the quality of the speaker is inferior.

reviews.reviewTitle: As good as my BOSE mini speaker
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded from the 2nd edition of Echo Dot on Amazon Day and got a great deal. Main reason to upgrade was sound quality. Very pleased with the results.
This thing cranks. Great sound. It becomes the center of the fun whoever we have people over. We have a few other devices connected to it. I look forward to expanding its capabilities
Great product, unfortunately I had to return back cause it was order by mistake but it have a super sound quality!

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing sound quality and worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: This thing is awesome, I’m am more than satisfied with it. The sound quality is amazing! Also, I like how you can control the volume etc from your phone. I don’t regret the purchase one bit.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good speaker, but Alexa needs some bug fixes
reviews.reviewText: Sounds great, and it can hear you over pretty loud music which is nice. My only real issue is that Alexa can be glitchy, specifically when I ask her to play the same songs/playlists that she’s played before, but sometimes she says she can’t find it, or tells me to get the house party app, when she played the same song yesterday. Overall a great unit but just a little buggy at times.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buy this first in your Alexa line up...
reviews.reviewText:
We love our Echo Plus, is has the hub built right in and runs our smart home devices without any additional connection devices.
Premium sound and size is not intrusive in the room. Buy this first before you start adding to your smart home!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great multi function device for starting smart home
reviews.reviewText: Clear sounds loud speakers. Could use a bit of base but overall there good considering all the other functions. I run a duel set up with speaker in separate rooms. Alexa won’t turn off at secondary speaker have to talk to main speaker to shut off music

The only reason I upgrade from my Alexa first generation to this one was because Amazon sent me an email stating I would need to upgrade if I still wanted my Iris smart plugs to work because Lowe’s was stopping service. So I upgraded and my Iris still doesn’t work. False advertisement in my opinion.
This thing stinks. I have to unplug it every day for it to work. It doesn’t hear my voice anymore.

I started with an echo dot and thought I would try out the Plus because I love streaming music through it. I was not disappointed when I got it, very easy to use and I like the sound quality. It isn't going to rattle your windows but it is perfect for me.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it for the quality of music and that I can even hook it up to my Bose.
reviews.reviewText: It works perfectly back in FL but up in the mtns here it was not good with WiFi connection. That’s not anything new. Funny my little Alexa Dot works perfectly here in the mtns.

reviews.reviewTitle: ask about the lights even when Alexa is sleeping.
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is good, the size and color are good. I am not sure I am happy with it keeping track of everything I say to it.
I got this for music mostly and to go with the 2 dots I have in the bedrooms. Great sound and I love getting daily info from Alexa.

reviews.reviewTitle: A must have for your Alexa smart home
reviews.reviewText: What an improvement over the previous generation both in sound and in ability to control more devices such as smart bulbs with its built in hub.

Got my parents this for Christmas, they love it. Helps my mom with answering questions she has and with cooking related questions. Helps my dad with phone numbers and weather as well as news. Speaker is nice, I would highly suggest getting Amazon Music or Spotify Premium to help on the music end of things makes life alot easier.
Awesome sound for the price. Stereo pair with subwoofer is a complete high Fidelity stereo sound system that responds to anything you want it to do for you for music and information

reviews.reviewTitle: Very Good Sound for One Speaker
reviews.reviewText: The sound is very good for the small size of the speaker. Being able to adjust bass, midrange, and treble is nice to get it to sound how I prefer.
