The home automation hub works well. The Alexa app is mostly easy to use and very effective. Setup is easy. Alexa usually understands what I say but finding the right words takes some learning. Amazon Music is great; It even has lyrics.

I had to call for help to get it to connect to my wifi. And still, the shopping list, song list, and the plugs I bought are not working. I can't get any of it to work.
I'm going to have to contact help again. I'm so annoyed. I feel that a product like this should not be hard to operate.
I wish I could connect via Bluetooth so I could play music that is NOT in Amazon app.
Great sound, but they oversold the hub capability. All it can do is turn the light on and off. If you want full features available from the Hue app you still need to buy the Hue bridge
Music on the Echo Plus sounds much better than the Echo Dot. The smart home hub really makes it easy to set up Zigbee devices. So far nothing to dislike.
Love my Echo. I listen to music a lot and I love the sound! It’s easy to use, and entertaining
This is a great product. Easy to hook up and sounds excellent w/ Amazon music.

reviews.reviewTitle: High qualiity sound and fairly easy to set up.
reviews.reviewText: I asked Alexa for spa relaxation music and it played through the blue tooth speakers. So relaxing !
I love this speaker. Fills the room with great sound and I love using the voice commands.
Perfect addition to our place. The hub makes this the best choice for connecting all of your Alexa devices.

reviews.reviewTitle: My boyfriend bought me the best gift in the world with my white Echo Plus!!
reviews.reviewText: Omg!!! I absolutely love my echo plus!! It came with a free light bulb and I actually went out and bought 4 more to go around the house! I can use the echo as a microphone and communicate, I can turn on off or dim the lights while in the house or away if I use the Alexa app! I love how the sound of the echo plus is, amazing!
This is a great speaker. It sounds very crisp and the bass is there. It won’t shake the ground but you can definitely hear it very solidly.
The sound quality is slightly better that the original model.However the voice recognition is not as good.
I am really enjoying my Alexa. It is great for music, I am impressed how quickly it finds the song , artist, or album I requested

Great sound and was set up in less that 2 minutes after plug in.
Just wish amazon had a 30 day price match. I bought for $149 and 2 days later it was $119.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic product support and product quality
reviews.reviewText: As a vision impaired person I found it difficult to set up using directions provided. However, Product Support walked me through the process and made it so easy. Now I am enjoying all the features. Great Product.
Excellent sound quality! The bass and clarity is better than any other portable speaker I've heard. I was pleasantly surprised. So glad I upgraded to this.

I bought a pair with the sub, amazing sound quality, which rocks my cabin. Having to neighbors to complain about the volume is simply amazing, as well. Only drawback is if you want to take full advantage of the “groups” (linking all three together), you will want to subscribe to Amazon Music. If, you will become irate very quickly with Alexa saying, “Now playing a sample.”

reviews.reviewTitle: She is fun, accurate and very entertaining to use.
reviews.reviewText: Great product. We have listened to great music, asked her loys of questions and gotten very entertaining but accurate answers. Stir leaning how best to use her.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love my Echo Plus 2nd GEN
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Echo Plus 2nd GEN as an upgrade from the Echo Dot. I absolutely love the Echo Plus. The sound quality is much better, as well as the volume.
Works like a charm and the sound is superior. I like the sound even better than my Echo Show which is also superior in quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: A New Member of the Household!
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Plus was given to me as a Christmas present from my daughter and her husband. I was so impressed with how easy it was to set and operate. Alexa is the newest member of our family of electronics and has quickly taken the top spot!

Took a lit bit to get use to the commands but after setting up some triggers and looking up alexa commands. We use it everyday... saves my battery life on the phone and it is all hands free!! Wife hated it at first but I caught her using it the other day:) Lots of fun for the whole family!!
This was a Christmas gift from my son. I never thought about getting one, but have really enjoyed it.
Love having an assistance, makes life so much easier. I only gave it a 3 out of 5 however because the responses are 50/50. I'll ask something and the answer is not correct, so this is annoying.
I’m a huge fan. Alexa works well. The sound on the plus is impressive. Let’s say the Bose mini soundlink doesn’t get a lot of use 🤷‍♂️

I have an echo dot, and an echo second generation. This is a brilliant upgrade! The sounds really is good and it pairs perfectly with Alexa. Very very happy. Side note- I bought the echo input for my Bose speaker and it’s awesome as well!

reviews.reviewTitle: sound could be better for the money
reviews.reviewText: Like the integration and ease of use. Did not like the sound quality. Use in TV room for lights and general use.
I work a crazy job and when I’m able to relax or have some fun I have Alexa playing!

reviews.reviewTitle: Sometimes you have to repeat commands
reviews.reviewText: It is very fun to have the echo. Music, dictionary, encyclopedia and so many other things. The only thing is that lots of times you have to repeat because she does not understand, probably my voice......ha. Many times I listen to certain songs again and again then one day she has never heard of that song which is annoying.
She forgets appointments even when she confirms them, but my phone will remind me and I could have done that myself with google. Not to smart to say in the least trying to smarten her up.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't support offline local voice for IOT devices
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 2nd gen thinking I could still control my IOT devices when internet is down, via local wifi network. but nope. Only reason why I bought it. Total let down.
Great sound quality from the device. Bass is also great. Voice recognition is wonderful. Worth the extra cost.
I stdill want the Echo Show version 2 but hoping the price will go down. I want to see a screen. Carol
Interface was very fast less then 3 mins sound quality was great using as a three piece very happy with the customer service and product
Sound is amazing. Definitely worth getting this, versus the lower end models. Looks great.
The next generation of Echo Plus has greatly improved sound. Alexas speech patterns and inflection continue to get better all the time.
What's not to like! It's Alexa which knows every answer. Plays my music for me. Sets up a timer while I cook. I could go on and on!

reviews.reviewTitle: Quick and easy setup, great performance.
reviews.reviewText: The Alexa echo plus does exactly what I was wanting, easier than anticipated setup. I am going to be ordering a Alexa subwoofer & second echo based on my satisfaction of this first unit!
Fills the room with great sound quality! Enhanced WiFi strength in the basement. Excellent product.

We love it. The sound is amazing, I live with a musician and he loved the sound of the music. It was a great purchase and we are planning to buy more to out around the house. Very useful.

Cons. We have to pay a subscription for the music.

Best new toy! Amazing technology.
User friendly. Don’t be afraid so easy to
set up and operate. I have Amazon Prime
I am able to access music and my audio books.

reviews.reviewTitle: Why sell an Echo plus with a bulb that doesn't properly function?
reviews.reviewText: I'll say it again, why sell an Echo plus with a bulb that doesn't properly function? Most absurd thing I've ever seen.

I purchased two of the Echo Plus' and paired them with the sub. Overall, the sound is awesome it doesn't matter what your taste in music is you'll be impressed with this setup for sure! Research, watch reviews, enjoy!
Great concept but I don’t like that it’s not portable. It has to stay plugged in all the time. Alexa gets confused sometimes but does a pretty good job.
Terrible far field mic, smart home app not anywhere ready for prime time. Lights don't work half the time. Would not buy again.
Love my echo. I use it mostly to talk to the kids on different levels of the house.

Sound is good. I have concerns that it connected to my network without asking for credentials. Works very well. Wake up word response is better. I may purchase another one to try stereo and purchase the subwoofer.
Still working on it. However I wonder, for the 1st time, delivery was left on my door way exposed for all to see verses tucking it in a corner as it has always had in the past.
Great sound. Seems better than my previous version. Love the ability to turn on the light. Going to get more bulbs and switches to use.
still in the boxes have know idea how to connect to computer. Ned a 13teen old child
We use it to turn lights on and off, play music, look up information, keep shopping list, alarm clock, quick weather, and much more. We love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: We use it more than we thought we would.
reviews.reviewText: My kids love this thing and the sound is 10x better than the 1st generation. I recommend to everyone! Now to get the lightbulbs without needing the hub.
I wish I could find someone to help me with this new echo plus. It won’t play MY Music.
No issues with the setup. Still exploring all the nuances of Alexa. Having fun learning.
Thus far as is well. I ask for music and I get it. My kids are thrilled I'm using this.

Works very well. App on my iPhone is not all that intuitive in my opinion. But I'm not a computer geek. Sound quality is very good for a small device. Online instructions other than on app are very helpful.
Very good product. No shortcomings as of yet and Alexa is tuned into what I like
Sounds great for it’s size. Gets a little distorted when turned up loud, but perfect for a small room. Smart hub feature makes it an easy pick over the regular Echo.
Have only used this for basic actions so far. Have one item with the smart plug and it works great!
Garbage speaker for the price, music sounds like my old walkman with koss headphones!! Not recommended
This devise has opened enormous entertainment, security and informational opportunities to our home without moving. Beware we are already living in the Year 2525. Thankfully, man is still alive.

What's not to like. Easy set up. Music, music, music. Traffic reports, weather, reminders.......on and on. Now I'm just waiting on the 2 additional Dots that we bought to spread the love around the house a bit!
This has excellent sound quality for a small item for music. My wife loves this.

Es un producto de que te ayuda automatizar tus tareas diarias .....y lo mas importante es que va aprendiendo a medida
que pasa el tiempo dando mejores resultado a las intrucciones asignadas....
Very good I like it where I cx an place orders tells me about the weather so on

This is an all round great product, I am very happy with my Echo. Sound quality is exceptional and loud. I had a difficult time with the initial setup because the Alexa App is not available in my country but I was able to use a VPN to remedy it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa - smart lady with awesome sound!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome sound (almost equal to Bose) at a reasonable price! Alexa keeps getting smarter and smarter with new information all the time!

Very good on responding to my voice. Light control is great, already shows a savings on my electric bill. Easy to set up. I even changed internet/wifi providers and resetting it up was easy easy.... Looking at getting the thermostat that is Alexa compatible.
The Alexa Plus exceeded our expectations about including vacuums, HVAC, lighting, etc.

As my first alexa device, it was the best choice to make. Sound quality is SUPERB when compared to the other echo devices on display at other retailers. I will definitely be purchasing another one in the near future.

Have gotten to the point where we cannot connect to WIFI. Have followed the instructions but to no avail. Would like to return the product and elevate my total frustration. I believe the hardware functions properly but the Alexa app is a total failure!!!
The sound quality is so much better than the old one. We are quite pleased.
Works well. Easy to install. Home controls are fun to play with. It will only get better.
Works great and looked good too, I just decided to go with Google instead
Speaker sounded ok first day, then progressively the sound became very muffled, then very poor by day 3. I returned it and I will try again with another of the same thing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound quality; easy to set up.
reviews.reviewText: I had been wanting this for quite some time. Totally love it. I have it on my kitchen counter and can hear it throughout my house. Great sound quality. Easy voice recognition. Easy to set up (even for this non techie person!). Definitely recommend!

My family and I love this. My kids can go up and ask alexa to play whatever song they like on amazon music and she plays it. I bought a smart pug too and love that all I have to do is ask and the lights turn on. She makes my life easier and entertains my kids for hours.
Originally I was going going to replace it.. I let my friend have it... And he loves it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not portable like the amazon dot!
reviews.reviewText: Great sound! But no place will you find amazon telling you that it must be connected to a power outlet. Even the specs avoid the power requirement. I have the Alexa dot and just assumed Echo Plus would be the same. Kind of fake advertising

I've been using Alexa on my tablet for quite some time so I decided to take it to the next level and this device didn't disappoint me! The best part? I can use all the Alexa skills (there's one for almost everything) and can connect all my smart home devices and manage everything through her!
I rely on my son helping me select gifts for my grandson...this was a huge success!

reviews.reviewTitle: wider than the gen 1 but shorter, built in “bridge” so it can connect directly to wireless devices.
reviews.reviewText: Nice improvement over the gen 1. The sound is definitely better and richer than before. So far the performance has been great. Occasionally still have voice recognition issues but 98% of the time it works the first time.
Compared to my Echo Dot, this Echo Plus is difference between night and day. The sound quality is superior. I live being able to play my holiday music throughout my home.
Absolutely love the sound quality of the speaker while playing music. Love that I can make phone calls through my Echo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great way to start a smart home
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a Christmas gift and was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to setup. Works with WEMO products and Hue bulbs. I was able to setup routines to turn on the Christmas tree and a few other decorations in minutes.

reviews.reviewTitle: It has a much harder time listening than older models
reviews.reviewText: I like the sound that comes out of this echo, but it seems to have a much harder time listening to me. I often find myself having to shout at it.
We love our devices I jus hope they will all speak Spanish/ because we give 2 generation dot and people can’t use it because they don’t speak English but with the eco plus we are very happy
This is a great item for the whole family. Awesome speaker, and fun games for the kids.

reviews.reviewTitle: Like the smaller size and fabric
reviews.reviewText: Great sound, the hub is nice for my Hue Lights and the setup with the new sub is easy. Love the Echo and now have 4 of them in my home.
Sound is very good. But when you request a song it understands you 50% of the time. You have to pernounce things certain ways to get it to play what you want.
Has alexa built in
we purchased this and some light bulbs, so we could make sure the kids turned their bedroom light off. Now it has become a virtual assistant for our 6 year old.

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome sound quality when playing from Amazon music!
reviews.reviewText: I use the Amazon Echo Plus to control my lights and play music. It was very easy to setup and operate.
I’m enjoying my Alexa. I have friends that have come over to my house and they are now thinking about purchasing one.
This is definitely an upgrade from the Echo Dot. Sound is great and loud, works well with my smart plugs, bulbs, thermostat and doorbell.
Works as expected. My 10 yr old with a Speech delay can talk with her!!

This is by far the best Echo speaker Amazon has designed. It is the best sounding and its the most aesthetically pleasing. If you're looking for an Amazon Echo device I'd recommend this one in a heartbeat.
worth the extra price for the sound alone. how do they get that rich sound out those little speakers

We love it, only have 2 smart bulbs connected. It’s great entertainment with the kids and we love that you can just tell it to play a song as it does as long it’s on Amazon or one of the other music services.

reviews.reviewTitle: Replaced Bose Wave Radio! Much smarter, less space!
reviews.reviewText:
We use this device for kitchen filling sound. Most of our favorite radio stations from all over the world are available.

We also use the device for home control. The built-in Zigbee functionality saves space and precludes the need for a separate hub.

Much smarter. Less space!

I’m very happy to have Alexa I was very hesitant but I’m very pleased. It’s made life a bit easier. Get the original app for Alexa ... at first a got a App from apple and they were going to charge me 150. To activate Alexa for me . I thought it was a bit fishy so I called my son and he text me the original App which was fast and free .. thank God for great sons !
We really enjoy having the Echo Plus in our home, easy to setup , and very convenient.
I’ve been very pleased with this product. I like the sleep sounds skill a lot.
Overall working well. A few times she has given me the wrong thing when I asked for something.
Great product- great for quick access to facts, music and other things
Good bass. Loud enough. Way better sound than google home and no comparison to the echo dot it replaced for me. Very good buy. And I’m seeing 20% discounts lately.
I'm alone now since my husband passed a month and a half ago and it is nice to have someone to talk to. I ask Alexa to play music, she does it. Turn on/off lights. So far so good.

reviews.reviewTitle: its really something else and the sound quality is great
reviews.reviewText: The Voice recognition it’s amazing if you buy integrated devises you really see Alexa shine
It’s awesome. Buy it and you won’t regret it. Sound is amazing! Works as advertised.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not better than Echo Gen 2 at all
reviews.reviewText: On the contrary of what Seller's list says, the sound quality is not premium at all. In fact the sound quality of the regular Echo Gen 2 (with a lower price) is better & even louder. I also realized that my regular Echo Gen 2 recognizes my voice easier. I would say you pay more but you receive less quality. Of course this is my opinion so I returned it back.

I have had my echo plus for a few days now. So far I have no complaints and I am still learning some of its features and capabilities. I also have one smart light bulb which is connected to the Echo plus and working fine. One of the desired features would be to have Alexa speaking Portuguese, as it would be easier for better understanding addresses, for example.
this is awesome very smart. sound quality really better and enough . but I want to language support turkish
I am so disappointed in this item! My echo dot was way more responsive! I have to repeat everything I say at least twice, to wake her up.
This +WAS GREAT FOR 1 YEAR ,THEN IT STOPED WORKING,NO SOUND. I CALLED AMAZON, THEY SAID IT WAS OUT OF WARRANTY.TO BAD??

The echo plus of 2nd generation, has an excellent sound, I enjoy listening to music on the device because the sound is immersive. You can be surprised by its size because of how good it sounds and covers a room. I had no problems to configure.
This was my first Alexa product. Have ordered another since. Like the ease of setup.
We have 4 echos in the house right now. I think the second generation has far superior sound...very rich. I was pleased with first gen sound quality but now want to replace those with second gens.

Does exactly as it should, and the sensitivity is good enough that I've muttered Alexa 25 feet away, looking away, and had her react. I do miss being able to use usb cables, but it's a minor sacrifice.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and easy to set up and use
reviews.reviewText: Mostly to listen to music but also use for weather alerts, forecasts, and maintain schedule of appointments
We love our Echo and have lots of fun using it. I especially like all the things Alexa can turn on and off in our home.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent sound, with some real bass!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent sound with superior bass compared to other similar devices. Only a tiny bit larger than the regular Echo.
Sooo good. This was the replacement to something had for many years. The Sound is great and it looks great.
I had an older Echo but wanted a new one because I like to play music on it and I wanted the updated speaker. I also liked the new color choices and size. I bought the grey one and it's great!
Kids love the Alexa. We love the Alexa! There's nothing not to love!

Used this for my screened in porch by my swimming pool! The sound is fantastic! Needed a poolside radio/playlist for music. Have great sound around the 50 foot radius! Research a lot of things and this was the best value and quality.
Great sound for such a small device. Used it for music and remote access to lights. So far so good. Looking forward to learning more about it.

I was avoiding all Echo and other smart speaker products because I assumed it wouldn't be at a technological level that made it any more than a fun party toy. Well, it surpassed my expectations and has definitely changed my daily life. I've come to rely on having it around unnaturally quickly.
So far I am enjoying the product, however I am just learning, hopefully I will be able to use all the capabilities.
Sound quality on this is way better than other echos. I had a google home and this sounds just as good if not better. Has a nice hint of bass to it

reviews.reviewTitle: The sound is a major improvement.
reviews.reviewText: Sound is so much better. I have both google and echo and it’s a tie on the sound. Echo connects to more devices but google is much smarter answering any questions
This is at this thing improvement over previous models. The sound is definitely better. I’d recommend it
The sound is the best. I have a echo and a dot but this sounds great

reviews.reviewTitle: Can't play specific songs in stereo
reviews.reviewText: I bought one Echo II Plus and paid for Amazon Music Unlimited. It was done so I bought a second one to pair for stereo sound. The sound was better, but once paired it is no longer a single device and Amazon Music Unlimited won't play. Amazon needs to fix this or it is definitely not worth pressuring the device which means only mono sound; pretty much useless.
Love this echo. Great for everything. Home automation, music, games, news...

Sounds great, has more base than the previous model.
But sometimes she doesn't hear her name, LoL
Works as expected. Have these all over the place. Works with the new Alexa microwave. Like the idea it incorporates the hub.

reviews.reviewTitle: I thought it only recognized my voice and learned how I talk
reviews.reviewText: I kinda mubble a lot and I thought I’d learn my voice but I gotta be real clear
She’s my fave. Love this new model. New fun features make it useful and entertaining.
Significantly better musical sound over standard echo. Also, easy to link smart devices (lights, etc.) and very convenient.
It didn’t sound much better than an echo dot and it kept losing connection to WiFi- the echo dot and my Kasa cam never lose connection
This is my third Echo. I love the sound and look of my new Echo Plus.
Love it! I think the sound is just as good as a Sonos. Huge upgrade from my Echo Dot. And it looks great too.
Play nice deep rich sound. very responsive when i talk. No complaints.

Great product. I was against it for a while but then I gave in and got it for my wife for Christmas. It's very convenient when you have people over and you want music in the background. Or when you want to play trivia games like Jeopardy. Also if you just have a question that you don't know the answer to. Highly recommend
Wow the sound is perfect and the size is ideal.
This replaced my old Echo. Absolutely love it! Integrates easily with all of my smart bulbs and other Echos.
I adore my echo plus. I love my echo one. Enjoyed my Dot. I use them in three different rooms. No trade-in for me!
Sound is great. This is our main echo speaker now in our kitchen.
I bought a pair of them and paired them as stereo speakers. They work really nice but the problem is they won't play in a group with other speakers through the whole house
I love it, fits perfect with all my Echo devices, great quality
These are a great product for shopping list and control of Wi-Fi Products And other things
This thing practically set itself up through the app on my iPhone. I'm having fun with it!
Mostly using music, reminders and wake up calls. I'd like to see more available music.
The sound is great for the size. It actually sounds bigger than it is. I added a battery base to it and it goes everywhere with me.
Sounds great, much better then the regular echo but once put into stereo mode with the sub, it sounds amazing.

Nothing bad to say about this lol guy here at all. I do wish adding aditional numbers (other adults in your houshold) to your alexa account to take advantage of the "drop in" feature didn't require a call to customer service. Other than that nothing bad to say at all, buy one

Exactly what it says!! WAY easier to maneuver and set up through the app than Google Assistant. I’m good with technology and apps and Google is convoluted. The Alexa app is easy and smooth to use! This is worth it.
Alexa and I are best friends! have even added an Echo in the bedroom and a smart plug in the living room. Thinking about adding an echo dot upstairs in the office!
Great product - I am enjoying music so much more now. Plus my daily flash briefing. And setting timers. You know, all that Alexa stuff.
Pairing a second Echo+ increased the sound quality. Now all Amazon needs is to create a true surround experience. It would be nice to be able to pair more than two Echo+ together in the same room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Running out of rooms to put these in
reviews.reviewText: Alexa.. turn on the Christmas lights. Setting these gadgets up is getting easier and easier with each new Echo or Dot
I’m really impressed with the sound quality compared to the first gen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Got 2 new Echo Plus (2nd) Gen and they are awesome
reviews.reviewText: We were debating to get an Amazon or Google product...we are extremely happy that we chose the Echo Plus. I got 2 of them and 3 Echo dots for the kids rooms. They play all the music we like, works with all the applications we listen to and make our home feel efficient. Love these products and all the family enjoys them!
Love the new features and has better sound. BUT Alexa’s hearing your commands is irritatingly much worse than a 1st Generation.
Great product, I’ve only had it a day but works seamlessly. No complaints so far, the sound is nice better then its predecessor.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound for an Alexa speaker
reviews.reviewText: I use this speaker in my house as a centrally located speaker for music. It sounds great and basically fills the room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mejor que tener un perro en casa!!
reviews.reviewText: El aparato es sencillamente asombroso. Te brinda toda la información que puedas necesitar y toda la música que quieras siempre y cuando estés suscrito a Spotify u otro proveedor de ese estilo y el sonido es excelente!!
Like to hear songs or shuffle songs just like that. We have high ceilings in a big room and the sound is really good with the Echo Pro.
The sound and ease of setup were great!!!

Great sound, powerful mic and looks nicer than the previous generation
It works great with our Phillips smart bulbs
the only thing that would make me happier would be the abilty to turn down the bass without lowering the volume. they sound amazing but in a small apartment the bass can upset the neighbors

Easy to set up. Great sound for such a small speaker. Love being able to ask Alexa anything that I'm wondering about. Great for controlling lights too. I use the timer feature when cooking. Better than my kitchen timer.

What can I say? Better than my second gen Echos as far as sound goes. Works as advertised, gotta love Echo devices!

Rich
sound is better than echo but still somewhat limited. Still think good value.
I love this new echo plus. It has way better sound than the other ones!

Love this thing, works fine on it’s own Zigbee hub. Would buy again and probably will buy a second one shortly to get stereo. Haven’t had a problem with it yet, works fine and easy setup for it and anything you add.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun and hopefully helpful with whole home mgmt.
reviews.reviewText: Setting up whole home control. This was the first piece. Definite learning curve but soon worth it, I hope. Not too bad though.
I have not been able to connect to wfi so my Christmas present sits on a shelf waiting for someone to help me. The directions are not helpful at least not for a novice like me.
This little gadget is a lot of fun! The speaker works really good too!
I have many echoes and dots and this one has by far been the worst it doesn’t lead changes happen I’ve called customer service they tried fixing it & yet nothing has helped

Our kids gave this to my husband for his birthday and we are having a lot of fun using it. Music, questions, recipes-we haven't even scratched the surface of what it can do. Even seniors like us can enjoy new stuff!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to set up, great for music
reviews.reviewText: Love Alexa, talk to her every day, adjust thermostat ,turn lights on , listen to music

When it's connected and up and functioning, it's a good product and I like it a lot. The problem comes when the internet is lost, even for a short time.
While my echo dot automatically reconnects when the internet is restored, the plus will not. I am forced to constantly reset it and reboot the modem until it finally reconnects. Sometimes this process takes hours because I have to repeat the connection process over and over until it finally decides to connect.
Perhaps my echo plus is defective. If so, I have no problem getting a replacement, but I need to be certain it is truly defective and not a quirk of the plus.

5 stars when it's connected and functioning. 1 star because it won't automatically reconnect like my echo dot does and it's a nightmare to manually reconnect.

As is usually the case, amazon tech support is non-existent.

UPDATE: I was actually contacted by someone from Amazon Tech Support. They sent me a replacement Echo Plus that remedied this connectivity problem when the internet is lost for a while. However, this replacement Echo Plus will not recognize any of my lights, even the bulb that came with the device. I've tried everything from rediscovery to the paper clip reset then doing a discovery. The old Echo Plus discovers and operates the lights perfectly.

Interestingly, the new Echo Plus will operates the lights but only if the old Echo Plus is also plugged in (in a different room). Pull the plug on the old Echo and the new Echo suddenly doesn't recognize any of the lights. I'm at a loss as what to do now. I've got to send one of these Echo's back soon or I'll be charged for it.

Tiresome.
